34 
51 QCPPainter::QCPPainter() :
52  QPainter(),
53  mModes(pmDefault),
54  mIsAntialiasing(false)
55 {
56  // don't setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefautPen) here, because painter isn't active yet and
57  // a call to begin() will follow
58 }
59 
66 QCPPainter::QCPPainter(QPaintDevice *device) :
67  QPainter(device),
68  mModes(pmDefault),
69  mIsAntialiasing(false)
70 {
71 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
72  if (isActive())
73  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
74 #endif
75 }
76 
77 QCPPainter::~QCPPainter()
78 {
79 }
80 
87 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QPen &pen)
88 {
89  QPainter::setPen(pen);
90  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
91  makeNonCosmetic();
92 }
93 
101 void QCPPainter::setPen(const QColor &color)
102 {
103  QPainter::setPen(color);
104  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
105  makeNonCosmetic();
106 }
107 
115 void QCPPainter::setPen(Qt::PenStyle penStyle)
116 {
117  QPainter::setPen(penStyle);
118  if (mModes.testFlag(pmNonCosmetic))
119  makeNonCosmetic();
120 }
121 
130 void QCPPainter::drawLine(const QLineF &line)
131 {
132  if (mIsAntialiasing || mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized))
133  QPainter::drawLine(line);
134  else
135  QPainter::drawLine(line.toLine());
136 }
137 
144 void QCPPainter::setAntialiasing(bool enabled)
145 {
146  setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, enabled);
147  if (mIsAntialiasing != enabled)
148  {
149  mIsAntialiasing = enabled;
150  if (!mModes.testFlag(pmVectorized)) // antialiasing half-pixel shift only needed for rasterized outputs
151  {
152  if (mIsAntialiasing)
153  translate(0.5, 0.5);
154  else
155  translate(-0.5, -0.5);
156  }
157  }
158 }
159 
164 void QCPPainter::setModes(QCPPainter::PainterModes modes)
165 {
166  mModes = modes;
167 }
168 
180 bool QCPPainter::begin(QPaintDevice *device)
181 {
182  bool result = QPainter::begin(device);
183 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0) // before Qt5, default pens used to be cosmetic if NonCosmeticDefaultPen flag isn't set. So we set it to get consistency across Qt versions.
184  if (result)
185  setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
186 #endif
187  return result;
188 }
189 
195 void QCPPainter::setMode(QCPPainter::PainterMode mode, bool enabled)
196 {
197  if (!enabled && mModes.testFlag(mode))
198  mModes &= ~mode;
199  else if (enabled && !mModes.testFlag(mode))
200  mModes |= mode;
201 }
202 
211 void QCPPainter::save()
212 {
213  mAntialiasingStack.push(mIsAntialiasing);
214  QPainter::save();
215 }
216 
225 void QCPPainter::restore()
226 {
227  if (!mAntialiasingStack.isEmpty())
228  mIsAntialiasing = mAntialiasingStack.pop();
229  else
230  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Unbalanced save/restore";
231  QPainter::restore();
232 }
233 
238 void QCPPainter::makeNonCosmetic()
239 {
240  if (qFuzzyIsNull(pen().widthF()))
241  {
242  QPen p = pen();
243  p.setWidth(1);
244  QPainter::setPen(p);
245  }
246 }

343 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle() :
344  mSize(6),
345  mShape(ssNone),
346  mPen(Qt::NoPen),
347  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
348  mPenDefined(false)

350 }

409 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle(ScatterShape shape, const QPen &pen, const QBrush &brush, double size) :
410  mSize(size),

412  mPen(pen),
413  mBrush(brush),
414  mPenDefined(pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)

441 QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle(const QPainterPath &customPath, const QPen &pen, const QBrush &brush, double size) :
442  mSize(size),

509  mPixmap = pixmap;

517 void QCPScatterStyle::setCustomPath(const QPainterPath &customPath)
518 {
519  setShape(ssCustom);
520  mCustomPath = customPath;
521 }
522 
532 void QCPScatterStyle::applyTo(QCPPainter *painter, const QPen &defaultPen) const
533 {
534  painter->setPen(mPenDefined ? mPen : defaultPen);
535  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
536 }
537 
546 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, QPointF pos) const
547 {
548  drawShape(painter, pos.x(), pos.y());
549 }
550 
554 void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y) const
555 {
556  double w = mSize/2.0;
557  switch (mShape)
558  {
559  case ssNone: break;
560  case ssDot:
561  {
562  painter->drawLine(QPointF(x, y), QPointF(x+0.0001, y));
563  break;
564  }
565  case ssCross:
566  {
567  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w, y+w));
568  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w, x+w, y-w));
569  break;
570  }
571  case ssPlus:
572  {
573  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
574  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
575  break;
576  }
577  case ssCircle:
578  {
579  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
580  break;
581  }
582  case ssDisc:
583  {
584  QBrush b = painter->brush();
585  painter->setBrush(painter->pen().color());
586  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
587  painter->setBrush(b);
588  break;
589  }
590  case ssSquare:
591  {
592  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
593  break;
594  }
595  case ssDiamond:
596  {
597  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x, y-w));
598  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-w, x+w, y));
599  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y, x, y+w));
600  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x-w, y));
601  break;
602  }
603  case ssStar:
604  {
605  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
606  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
607  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
608  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y-w*0.707));
609  break;
610  }
611  case ssTriangle:
612  {
613  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+0.755*w, x+w, y+0.755*w));
614  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y+0.755*w, x, y-0.977*w));
615  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y-0.977*w, x-w, y+0.755*w));
616  break;
617  }
618  case ssTriangleInverted:
619  {
620  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-0.755*w, x+w, y-0.755*w));
621  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+w, y-0.755*w, x, y+0.977*w));
622  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+0.977*w, x-w, y-0.755*w));
623  break;
624  }
625  case ssCrossSquare:
626  {
627  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w*0.95, y+w*0.95));
628  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w*0.95, x+w*0.95, y-w));
629  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
630  break;
631  }
632  case ssPlusSquare:
633  {
634  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w*0.95, y));
635  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
636  painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
637  break;
638  }
639  case ssCrossCircle:
640  {
641  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.670, y+w*0.670));
642  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.670, x+w*0.670, y-w*0.707));
643  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
644  break;
645  }
646  case ssPlusCircle:
647  {
648  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
649  painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
650  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
651  break;
652  }
653  case ssPeace:
654  {
655  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-w, x, y+w));
656  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
657  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
658  painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
659  break;
660  }
661  case ssPixmap:
662  {
663  painter->drawPixmap(x-mPixmap.width()*0.5, y-mPixmap.height()*0.5, mPixmap);
664  break;
665  }
666  case ssCustom:
667  {
668  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
669  painter->translate(x, y);
670  painter->scale(mSize/6.0, mSize/6.0);
671  painter->drawPath(mCustomPath);
672  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
673  break;
674  }
675  }
676 }
677

726 
741 /* end documentation of inline functions */
742 
751 QCPLayer::QCPLayer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &layerName) :
752  QObject(parentPlot),
753  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
754  mName(layerName),
755  mIndex(-1) // will be set to a proper value by the QCustomPlot layer creation function
756 {
757  // Note: no need to make sure layerName is unique, because layer
758  // management is done with QCustomPlot functions.
759 }
760 
761 QCPLayer::~QCPLayer()
762 {
763  // If child layerables are still on this layer, detach them, so they don't try to reach back to this
764  // then invalid layer once they get deleted/moved themselves. This only happens when layers are deleted
765  // directly, like in the QCustomPlot destructor. (The regular layer removal procedure for the user is to
766  // call QCustomPlot::removeLayer, which moves all layerables off this layer before deleting it.)
767 
768  while (!mChildren.isEmpty())
769  mChildren.last()->setLayer(0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild()
770 
771  if (mParentPlot->currentLayer() == this)
772  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The parent plot's mCurrentLayer will be a dangling pointer. Should have been set to a valid layer or 0 beforehand.";
773 }
774 
785 void QCPLayer::addChild(QCPLayerable *layerable, bool prepend)
786 {
787  if (!mChildren.contains(layerable))
788  {
789  if (prepend)
790  mChildren.prepend(layerable);
791  else
792  mChildren.append(layerable);
793  } else
794  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is already child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
795 }
796 
806 void QCPLayer::removeChild(QCPLayerable *layerable)
807 {
808  if (!mChildren.removeOne(layerable))
809  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layerable is not child of this layer" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layerable);
810 }
811

846 
887 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
888 
907 QCPLayerable::QCPLayerable(QCustomPlot *plot, QString targetLayer, QCPLayerable *parentLayerable) :
908  QObject(plot),
909  mVisible(true),
910  mParentPlot(plot),
911  mParentLayerable(parentLayerable),
912  mLayer(0),
913  mAntialiased(true)
914 {
915  if (mParentPlot)
916  {
917  if (targetLayer.isEmpty())
918  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer());
919  else if (!setLayer(targetLayer))
920  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "setting QCPlayerable initial layer to" << targetLayer << "failed.";
921  }
922 }
923 
924 QCPLayerable::~QCPLayerable()
925 {
926  if (mLayer)
927  {
928  mLayer->removeChild(this);
929  mLayer = 0;
930  }
931 }
932 
938 void QCPLayerable::setVisible(bool on)
939 {
940  mVisible = on;
941 }
942 
949 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
950 {
951  return moveToLayer(layer, false);
952 }
953 
959 bool QCPLayerable::setLayer(const QString &layerName)
960 {
961  if (!mParentPlot)
962  {
963  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
964  return false;
965  }
966  if (QCPLayer *layer = mParentPlot->layer(layerName))
967  {
968  return setLayer(layer);
969  } else
970  {
971  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "there is no layer with name" << layerName;
972  return false;
973  }
974 }
975 
982 void QCPLayerable::setAntialiased(bool enabled)
983 {
984  mAntialiased = enabled;
985 }
986 
1000 bool QCPLayerable::realVisibility() const
1001 {
1002  return mVisible && (!mParentLayerable || mParentLayerable.data()->realVisibility());
1003 }
1004 
1039 double QCPLayerable::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
1040 {
1041  Q_UNUSED(pos)
1042  Q_UNUSED(onlySelectable)
1043  Q_UNUSED(details)
1044  return -1.0;
1045 }
1046 
1064 void QCPLayerable::initializeParentPlot(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1065 {
1066  if (mParentPlot)
1067  {
1068  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with mParentPlot already initialized";
1069  return;
1070  }
1071 
1072  if (!parentPlot)
1073  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called with parentPlot zero";
1074 
1075  mParentPlot = parentPlot;
1076  parentPlotInitialized(mParentPlot);
1077 }
1078 
1090 void QCPLayerable::setParentLayerable(QCPLayerable *parentLayerable)
1091 {
1092  mParentLayerable = parentLayerable;
1093 }
1094 
1103 bool QCPLayerable::moveToLayer(QCPLayer *layer, bool prepend)
1104 {
1105  if (layer && !mParentPlot)
1106  {
1107  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent QCustomPlot set";
1108  return false;
1109  }
1110  if (layer && layer->parentPlot() != mParentPlot)
1111  {
1112  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer" << layer->name() << "is not in same QCustomPlot as this layerable";
1113  return false;
1114  }
1115 
1116  if (mLayer)
1117  mLayer->removeChild(this);
1118  mLayer = layer;
1119  if (mLayer)
1120  mLayer->addChild(this, prepend);
1121  return true;
1122 }
1123 
1131 void QCPLayerable::applyAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter, bool localAntialiased, QCP::AntialiasedElement overrideElement) const
1132 {
1133  if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1134  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
1135  else if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->antialiasedElements().testFlag(overrideElement))
1136  painter->setAntialiasing(true);
1137  else
1138  painter->setAntialiasing(localAntialiased);
1139 }
1140 
1157 void QCPLayerable::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
1158 {
1159  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
1160 }
1161 
1173 QCP::Interaction QCPLayerable::selectionCategory() const
1174 {
1175  return QCP::iSelectOther;
1176 }
1177 
1187 QRect QCPLayerable::clipRect() const
1188 {
1189  if (mParentPlot)
1190  return mParentPlot->viewport();
1191  else
1192  return QRect();
1193 }

1227  Q_UNUSED(details)
1228  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1229 }

1245  Q_UNUSED(selectionStateChanged)
1246 }

1267 const double QCPRange::minRange = 1e-280;
1268 
1277 const double QCPRange::maxRange = 1e250;
1278 
1282 QCPRange::QCPRange() :
1283  lower(0),
1284  upper(0)
1285 {
1286 }
1287 
1291 QCPRange::QCPRange(double lower, double upper) :
1292  lower(lower),
1293  upper(upper)
1294 {
1295  normalize();
1296 }
1297 
1301 double QCPRange::size() const
1302 {
1303  return upper-lower;
1304 }
1305 
1309 double QCPRange::center() const
1310 {
1311  return (upper+lower)*0.5;
1312 }
1313 
1318 void QCPRange::normalize()
1319 {
1320  if (lower > upper)
1321  qSwap(lower, upper);
1322 }
1323 
1336 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLogScale() const
1337 {
1338  double rangeFac = 1e-3;
1339  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1340  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1341  // can't have range spanning negative and positive values in log plot, so change range to fix it
1342  //if (qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.lower+1, 1) && !qFuzzyCompare(sanitizedRange.upper+1, 1))
1343  if (sanitizedRange.lower == 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper != 0.0)
1344  {
1345  // case lower is 0
1346  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1347  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1348  else
1349  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1350  } //else if (!qFuzzyCompare(lower+1, 1) && qFuzzyCompare(upper+1, 1))
1351  else if (sanitizedRange.lower != 0.0 && sanitizedRange.upper == 0.0)
1352  {
1353  // case upper is 0
1354  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1355  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1356  else
1357  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1358  } else if (sanitizedRange.lower < 0 && sanitizedRange.upper > 0)
1359  {
1360  // find out whether negative or positive interval is wider to decide which sign domain will be chosen
1361  if (-sanitizedRange.lower > sanitizedRange.upper)
1362  {
1363  // negative is wider, do same as in case upper is 0
1364  if (-rangeFac > sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac)
1365  sanitizedRange.upper = -rangeFac;
1366  else
1367  sanitizedRange.upper = sanitizedRange.lower*rangeFac;
1368  } else
1369  {
1370  // positive is wider, do same as in case lower is 0
1371  if (rangeFac < sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac)
1372  sanitizedRange.lower = rangeFac;
1373  else
1374  sanitizedRange.lower = sanitizedRange.upper*rangeFac;
1375  }
1376  }
1377  // due to normalization, case lower>0 && upper<0 should never occur, because that implies upper<lower
1378  return sanitizedRange;
1379 }
1380 
1385 QCPRange QCPRange::sanitizedForLinScale() const
1386 {
1387  QCPRange sanitizedRange(lower, upper);
1388  sanitizedRange.normalize();
1389  return sanitizedRange;
1390 }
1391 
1395 bool QCPRange::contains(double value) const
1396 {
1397  return value >= lower && value <= upper;
1398 }
1399 
1408 bool QCPRange::validRange(double lower, double upper)
1409 {
1410  /*
1411  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1412  upper < maxRange &&
1413  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1414  (lower < -minRange || lower > minRange) &&
1415  (upper < -minRange || upper > minRange));
1416  */
1417  return (lower > -maxRange &&
1418  upper < maxRange &&
1419  qAbs(lower-upper) > minRange &&
1420  qAbs(lower-upper) < maxRange);
1421 }
1422 
1432 bool QCPRange::validRange(const QCPRange &range)
1433 {
1434  /*
1435  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1436  range.upper < maxRange &&
1437  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1438  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange &&
1439  (range.lower < -minRange || range.lower > minRange) &&
1440  (range.upper < -minRange || range.upper > minRange));
1441  */
1442  return (range.lower > -maxRange &&
1443  range.upper < maxRange &&
1444  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) > minRange &&
1445  qAbs(range.lower-range.upper) < maxRange);
1446 }
1447 
1448 
1557 
1597 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1598 
1605 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1606 
1610 QCPMarginGroup::QCPMarginGroup(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1611  QObject(parentPlot),
1612  mParentPlot(parentPlot)
1613 {
1614  mChildren.insert(QCP::msLeft, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1615  mChildren.insert(QCP::msRight, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1616  mChildren.insert(QCP::msTop, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1617  mChildren.insert(QCP::msBottom, QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
1618 }
1619 
1620 QCPMarginGroup::~QCPMarginGroup()
1621 {
1622  clear();
1623 }
1624 
1629 bool QCPMarginGroup::isEmpty() const
1630 {
1631  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1632  while (it.hasNext())
1633  {
1634  it.next();
1635  if (!it.value().isEmpty())
1636  return false;
1637  }
1638  return true;
1639 }
1640 
1645 void QCPMarginGroup::clear()
1646 {
1647  // make all children remove themselves from this margin group:
1648  QHashIterator<QCP::MarginSide, QList<QCPLayoutElement*> > it(mChildren);
1649  while (it.hasNext())
1650  {
1651  it.next();
1652  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = it.value();
1653  for (int i=elements.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
1654  elements.at(i)->setMarginGroup(it.key(), 0); // removes itself from mChildren via removeChild
1655  }
1656 }
1657 
1668 int QCPMarginGroup::commonMargin(QCP::MarginSide side) const
1669 {
1670  // query all automatic margins of the layout elements in this margin group side and find maximum:
1671  int result = 0;
1672  const QList<QCPLayoutElement*> elements = mChildren.value(side);
1673  for (int i=0; i<elements.size(); ++i)
1674  {
1675  if (!elements.at(i)->autoMargins().testFlag(side))
1676  continue;
1677  int m = qMax(elements.at(i)->calculateAutoMargin(side), QCP::getMarginValue(elements.at(i)->minimumMargins(), side));
1678  if (m > result)
1679  result = m;
1680  }
1681  return result;
1682 }
1683 
1690 void QCPMarginGroup::addChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1691 {
1692  if (!mChildren[side].contains(element))
1693  mChildren[side].append(element);
1694  else
1695  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is already child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1696 }
1697 
1704 void QCPMarginGroup::removeChild(QCP::MarginSide side, QCPLayoutElement *element)
1705 {
1706  if (!mChildren[side].removeOne(element))
1707  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "element is not child of this margin group side" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(element);
1708 }
1709 
1710 
1714 
1741 /* start documentation of inline functions */
1742 
1790 /* end documentation of inline functions */
1791 
1796 QCPLayoutElement::QCPLayoutElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
1797  QCPLayerable(parentPlot), // parenthood is changed as soon as layout element gets inserted into a layout (except for top level layout)
1798  mParentLayout(0),
1799  mMinimumSize(),
1800  mMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, QWIDGETSIZE_MAX),
1801  mRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1802  mOuterRect(0, 0, 0, 0),
1803  mMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1804  mMinimumMargins(0, 0, 0, 0),
1805  mAutoMargins(QCP::msAll)
1806 {
1807 }
1808 
1809 QCPLayoutElement::~QCPLayoutElement()
1810 {
1811  setMarginGroup(QCP::msAll, 0); // unregister at margin groups, if there are any
1812  // unregister at layout:
1813  if (qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(mParentLayout)) // the qobject_cast is just a safeguard in case the layout forgets to call clear() in its dtor and this dtor is called by QObject dtor
1814  mParentLayout->take(this);
1815 }
1816 
1828 void QCPLayoutElement::setOuterRect(const QRect &rect)
1829 {
1830  if (mOuterRect != rect)
1831  {
1832  mOuterRect = rect;
1833  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1834  }
1835 }
1836 
1848 void QCPLayoutElement::setMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1849 {
1850  if (mMargins != margins)
1851  {
1852  mMargins = margins;
1853  mRect = mOuterRect.adjusted(mMargins.left(), mMargins.top(), -mMargins.right(), -mMargins.bottom());
1854  }
1855 }
1856 
1866 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumMargins(const QMargins &margins)
1867 {
1868  if (mMinimumMargins != margins)
1869  {
1870  mMinimumMargins = margins;
1871  }
1872 }
1873 
1884 void QCPLayoutElement::setAutoMargins(QCP::MarginSides sides)
1885 {
1886  mAutoMargins = sides;
1887 }
1888 
1898 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(const QSize &size)
1899 {
1900  if (mMinimumSize != size)
1901  {
1902  mMinimumSize = size;
1903  if (mParentLayout)
1904  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1905  }
1906 }
1907 
1912 void QCPLayoutElement::setMinimumSize(int width, int height)
1913 {
1914  setMinimumSize(QSize(width, height));
1915 }
1916 
1921 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(const QSize &size)
1922 {
1923  if (mMaximumSize != size)
1924  {
1925  mMaximumSize = size;
1926  if (mParentLayout)
1927  mParentLayout->sizeConstraintsChanged();
1928  }
1929 }
1930 
1935 void QCPLayoutElement::setMaximumSize(int width, int height)
1936 {
1937  setMaximumSize(QSize(width, height));
1938 }
1939 
1951 void QCPLayoutElement::setMarginGroup(QCP::MarginSides sides, QCPMarginGroup *group)
1952 {
1953  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> sideVector;
1954  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msLeft)) sideVector.append(QCP::msLeft);
1955  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msRight)) sideVector.append(QCP::msRight);
1956  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msTop)) sideVector.append(QCP::msTop);
1957  if (sides.testFlag(QCP::msBottom)) sideVector.append(QCP::msBottom);
1958 
1959  for (int i=0; i<sideVector.size(); ++i)
1960  {
1961  QCP::MarginSide side = sideVector.at(i);
1962  if (marginGroup(side) != group)
1963  {
1964  QCPMarginGroup *oldGroup = marginGroup(side);
1965  if (oldGroup) // unregister at old group
1966  oldGroup->removeChild(side, this);
1967 
1968  if (!group) // if setting to 0, remove hash entry. Else set hash entry to new group and register there
1969  {
1970  mMarginGroups.remove(side);
1971  } else // setting to a new group
1972  {
1973  mMarginGroups[side] = group;
1974  group->addChild(side, this);
1975  }
1976  }
1977  }
1978 }
1979 
1990 void QCPLayoutElement::update()
1991 {
1992  if (mAutoMargins != QCP::msNone)
1993  {
1994  // set the margins of this layout element according to automatic margin calculation, either directly or via a margin group:
1995  QMargins newMargins = mMargins;
1996  QVector<QCP::MarginSide> marginSides = QVector<QCP::MarginSide>() << QCP::msLeft << QCP::msRight << QCP::msTop << QCP::msBottom;
1997  for (int i=0; i<marginSides.size(); ++i)
1998  {
1999  QCP::MarginSide side = marginSides.at(i);
2000  if (mAutoMargins.testFlag(side)) // this side's margin shall be calculated automatically
2001  {
2002  if (mMarginGroups.contains(side))
2003  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, mMarginGroups[side]->commonMargin(side)); // this side is part of a margin group, so get the margin value from that group
2004  else
2005  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, calculateAutoMargin(side)); // this side is not part of a group, so calculate the value directly
2006  // apply minimum margin restrictions:
2007  if (QCP::getMarginValue(newMargins, side) < QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side))
2008  QCP::setMarginValue(newMargins, side, QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2009  }
2010  }
2011  setMargins(newMargins);
2012  }
2013 }
2014 
2022 QSize QCPLayoutElement::minimumSizeHint() const
2023 {
2024  return mMinimumSize;
2025 }
2026 
2034 QSize QCPLayoutElement::maximumSizeHint() const
2035 {
2036  return mMaximumSize;
2037 }
2038 
2046 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutElement::elements(bool recursive) const
2047 {
2048  Q_UNUSED(recursive)
2049  return QList<QCPLayoutElement*>();
2050 }
2051 
2063 double QCPLayoutElement::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
2064 {
2065  Q_UNUSED(details)
2066 
2067  if (onlySelectable)
2068  return -1;
2069 
2070  if (QRectF(mOuterRect).contains(pos))
2071  {
2072  if (mParentPlot)
2073  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
2074  else
2075  {
2076  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "parent plot not defined";
2077  return -1;
2078  }
2079  } else
2080  return -1;
2081 }
2082 
2088 void QCPLayoutElement::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
2089 {
2090  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> els = elements(false);
2091  for (int i=0; i<els.size(); ++i)
2092  {
2093  if (!els.at(i)->parentPlot())
2094  els.at(i)->initializeParentPlot(parentPlot);
2095  }
2096 }
2097 
2107 int QCPLayoutElement::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
2108 {
2109  return qMax(QCP::getMarginValue(mMargins, side), QCP::getMarginValue(mMinimumMargins, side));
2110 }
2111 
2115 
2139 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
2140 
2183 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
2184 
2189 QCPLayout::QCPLayout()
2190 {
2191 }
2192 
2201 void QCPLayout::update()
2202 {
2203  QCPLayoutElement::update(); // recalculates (auto-)margins
2204 
2205  // set child element rects according to layout:
2206  updateLayout();
2207 
2208  // propagate update call to child elements:
2209  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
2210  {
2211  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(i))
2212  el->update();
2213  }
2214 }
2215 
2216 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2217 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayout::elements(bool recursive) const
2218 {
2219  int c = elementCount();
2220  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
2221 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2222  result.reserve(c);
2223 #endif
2224  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2225  result.append(elementAt(i));
2226  if (recursive)
2227  {
2228  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2229  {
2230  if (result.at(i))
2231  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2232  }
2233  }
2234  return result;
2235 }
2236 
2244 void QCPLayout::simplify()
2245 {
2246 }
2247 
2257 bool QCPLayout::removeAt(int index)
2258 {
2259  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = takeAt(index))
2260  {
2261  delete el;
2262  return true;
2263  } else
2264  return false;
2265 }
2266 
2276 bool QCPLayout::remove(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2277 {
2278  if (take(element))
2279  {
2280  delete element;
2281  return true;
2282  } else
2283  return false;
2284 }
2285 
2291 void QCPLayout::clear()
2292 {
2293  for (int i=elementCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
2294  {
2295  if (elementAt(i))
2296  removeAt(i);
2297  }
2298  simplify();
2299 }
2300 
2309 void QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged() const
2310 {
2311  if (QWidget *w = qobject_cast<QWidget*>(parent()))
2312  w->updateGeometry();
2313  else if (QCPLayout *l = qobject_cast<QCPLayout*>(parent()))
2314  l->sizeConstraintsChanged();
2315 }
2316 
2329 void QCPLayout::updateLayout()
2330 {
2331 }
2332 
2333 
2346 void QCPLayout::adoptElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2347 {
2348  if (el)
2349  {
2350  el->mParentLayout = this;
2351  el->setParentLayerable(this);
2352  el->setParent(this);
2353  if (!el->parentPlot())
2354  el->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
2355  } else
2356  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2357 }
2358 
2369 void QCPLayout::releaseElement(QCPLayoutElement *el)
2370 {
2371  if (el)
2372  {
2373  el->mParentLayout = 0;
2374  el->setParentLayerable(0);
2375  el->setParent(mParentPlot);
2376  // Note: Don't initializeParentPlot(0) here, because layout element will stay in same parent plot
2377  } else
2378  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Null element passed";
2379 }
2380 
2410 QVector<int> QCPLayout::getSectionSizes(QVector<int> maxSizes, QVector<int> minSizes, QVector<double> stretchFactors, int totalSize) const
2411 {
2412  if (maxSizes.size() != minSizes.size() || minSizes.size() != stretchFactors.size())
2413  {
2414  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed vector sizes aren't equal:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors;
2415  return QVector<int>();
2416  }
2417  if (stretchFactors.isEmpty())
2418  return QVector<int>();
2419  int sectionCount = stretchFactors.size();
2420  QVector<double> sectionSizes(sectionCount);
2421  // if provided total size is forced smaller than total minimum size, ignore minimum sizes (squeeze sections):
2422  int minSizeSum = 0;
2423  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2424  minSizeSum += minSizes.at(i);
2425  if (totalSize < minSizeSum)
2426  {
2427  // new stretch factors are minimum sizes and minimum sizes are set to zero:
2428  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2429  {
2430  stretchFactors[i] = minSizes.at(i);
2431  minSizes[i] = 0;
2432  }
2433  }
2434 
2435  QList<int> minimumLockedSections;
2436  QList<int> unfinishedSections;
2437  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2438  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2439  double freeSize = totalSize;
2440 
2441  int outerIterations = 0;
2442  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && outerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2443  {
2444  ++outerIterations;
2445  int innerIterations = 0;
2446  while (!unfinishedSections.isEmpty() && innerIterations < sectionCount*2) // the iteration check ist just a failsafe in case something really strange happens
2447  {
2448  ++innerIterations;
2449  // find section that hits its maximum next:
2450  int nextId = -1;
2451  double nextMax = 1e12;
2452  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2453  {
2454  int secId = unfinishedSections.at(i);
2455  double hitsMaxAt = (maxSizes.at(secId)-sectionSizes.at(secId))/stretchFactors.at(secId);
2456  if (hitsMaxAt < nextMax)
2457  {
2458  nextMax = hitsMaxAt;
2459  nextId = secId;
2460  }
2461  }
2462  // check if that maximum is actually within the bounds of the total size (i.e. can we stretch all remaining sections so far that the found section
2463  // actually hits its maximum, without exceeding the total size when we add up all sections)
2464  double stretchFactorSum = 0;
2465  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2466  stretchFactorSum += stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2467  double nextMaxLimit = freeSize/stretchFactorSum;
2468  if (nextMax < nextMaxLimit) // next maximum is actually hit, move forward to that point and fix the size of that section
2469  {
2470  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2471  {
2472  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2473  freeSize -= nextMax*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i));
2474  }
2475  unfinishedSections.removeOne(nextId); // exclude the section that is now at maximum from further changes
2476  } else // next maximum isn't hit, just distribute rest of free space on remaining sections
2477  {
2478  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2479  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] += nextMaxLimit*stretchFactors.at(unfinishedSections.at(i)); // increment all sections
2480  unfinishedSections.clear();
2481  }
2482  }
2483  if (innerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2484  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected inner iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2485 
2486  // now check whether the resulting section sizes violate minimum restrictions:
2487  bool foundMinimumViolation = false;
2488  for (int i=0; i<sectionSizes.size(); ++i)
2489  {
2490  if (minimumLockedSections.contains(i))
2491  continue;
2492  if (sectionSizes.at(i) < minSizes.at(i)) // section violates minimum
2493  {
2494  sectionSizes[i] = minSizes.at(i); // set it to minimum
2495  foundMinimumViolation = true; // make sure we repeat the whole optimization process
2496  minimumLockedSections.append(i);
2497  }
2498  }
2499  if (foundMinimumViolation)
2500  {
2501  freeSize = totalSize;
2502  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2503  {
2504  if (!minimumLockedSections.contains(i)) // only put sections that haven't hit their minimum back into the pool
2505  unfinishedSections.append(i);
2506  else
2507  freeSize -= sectionSizes.at(i); // remove size of minimum locked sections from available space in next round
2508  }
2509  // reset all section sizes to zero that are in unfinished sections (all others have been set to their minimum):
2510  for (int i=0; i<unfinishedSections.size(); ++i)
2511  sectionSizes[unfinishedSections.at(i)] = 0;
2512  }
2513  }
2514  if (outerIterations == sectionCount*2)
2515  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Exceeded maximum expected outer iteration count, layouting aborted. Input was:" << maxSizes << minSizes << stretchFactors << totalSize;
2516 
2517  QVector<int> result(sectionCount);
2518  for (int i=0; i<sectionCount; ++i)
2519  result[i] = qRound(sectionSizes.at(i));
2520  return result;
2521 }
2522 
2523 
2527 
2547 QCPLayoutGrid::QCPLayoutGrid() :
2548  mColumnSpacing(5),
2549  mRowSpacing(5)
2550 {
2551 }
2552 
2553 QCPLayoutGrid::~QCPLayoutGrid()
2554 {
2555  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
2556  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
2557  clear();
2558 }
2559 
2568 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::element(int row, int column) const
2569 {
2570  if (row >= 0 && row < mElements.size())
2571  {
2572  if (column >= 0 && column < mElements.first().size())
2573  {
2574  if (QCPLayoutElement *result = mElements.at(row).at(column))
2575  return result;
2576  else
2577  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Requested cell is empty. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2578  } else
2579  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2580  } else
2581  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row. Row:" << row << "Column:" << column;
2582  return 0;
2583 }
2584 
2590 int QCPLayoutGrid::rowCount() const
2591 {
2592  return mElements.size();
2593 }
2594 
2600 int QCPLayoutGrid::columnCount() const
2601 {
2602  if (mElements.size() > 0)
2603  return mElements.first().size();
2604  else
2605  return 0;
2606 }
2607 
2618 bool QCPLayoutGrid::addElement(int row, int column, QCPLayoutElement *element)
2619 {
2620  if (element)
2621  {
2622  if (!hasElement(row, column))
2623  {
2624  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
2625  element->layout()->take(element);
2626  expandTo(row+1, column+1);
2627  mElements[row][column] = element;
2628  adoptElement(element);
2629  return true;
2630  } else
2631  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "There is already an element in the specified row/column:" << row << column;
2632  } else
2633  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element to row/column:" << row << column;
2634  return false;
2635 }
2636 
2643 bool QCPLayoutGrid::hasElement(int row, int column)
2644 {
2645  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount() && column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2646  return mElements.at(row).at(column);
2647  else
2648  return false;
2649 }
2650 
2662 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactor(int column, double factor)
2663 {
2664  if (column >= 0 && column < columnCount())
2665  {
2666  if (factor > 0)
2667  mColumnStretchFactors[column] = factor;
2668  else
2669  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2670  } else
2671  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid column:" << column;
2672 }
2673 
2685 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2686 {
2687  if (factors.size() == mColumnStretchFactors.size())
2688  {
2689  mColumnStretchFactors = factors;
2690  for (int i=0; i<mColumnStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2691  {
2692  if (mColumnStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2693  {
2694  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mColumnStretchFactors.at(i);
2695  mColumnStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2696  }
2697  }
2698  } else
2699  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Column count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2700 }
2701 
2713 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactor(int row, double factor)
2714 {
2715  if (row >= 0 && row < rowCount())
2716  {
2717  if (factor > 0)
2718  mRowStretchFactors[row] = factor;
2719  else
2720  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << factor;
2721  } else
2722  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid row:" << row;
2723 }
2724 
2736 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowStretchFactors(const QList<double> &factors)
2737 {
2738  if (factors.size() == mRowStretchFactors.size())
2739  {
2740  mRowStretchFactors = factors;
2741  for (int i=0; i<mRowStretchFactors.size(); ++i)
2742  {
2743  if (mRowStretchFactors.at(i) <= 0)
2744  {
2745  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid stretch factor, must be positive:" << mRowStretchFactors.at(i);
2746  mRowStretchFactors[i] = 1;
2747  }
2748  }
2749  } else
2750  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Row count not equal to passed stretch factor count:" << factors;
2751 }
2752 
2758 void QCPLayoutGrid::setColumnSpacing(int pixels)
2759 {
2760  mColumnSpacing = pixels;
2761 }
2762 
2768 void QCPLayoutGrid::setRowSpacing(int pixels)
2769 {
2770  mRowSpacing = pixels;
2771 }
2772 
2787 void QCPLayoutGrid::expandTo(int newRowCount, int newColumnCount)
2788 {
2789  // add rows as necessary:
2790  while (rowCount() < newRowCount)
2791  {
2792  mElements.append(QList<QCPLayoutElement*>());
2793  mRowStretchFactors.append(1);
2794  }
2795  // go through rows and expand columns as necessary:
2796  int newColCount = qMax(columnCount(), newColumnCount);
2797  for (int i=0; i<rowCount(); ++i)
2798  {
2799  while (mElements.at(i).size() < newColCount)
2800  mElements[i].append(0);
2801  }
2802  while (mColumnStretchFactors.size() < newColCount)
2803  mColumnStretchFactors.append(1);
2804 }
2805 
2812 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertRow(int newIndex)
2813 {
2814  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2815  {
2816  expandTo(1, 1);
2817  return;
2818  }
2819 
2820  if (newIndex < 0)
2821  newIndex = 0;
2822  if (newIndex > rowCount())
2823  newIndex = rowCount();
2824 
2825  mRowStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2826  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> newRow;
2827  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2828  newRow.append((QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2829  mElements.insert(newIndex, newRow);
2830 }
2831 
2838 void QCPLayoutGrid::insertColumn(int newIndex)
2839 {
2840  if (mElements.isEmpty() || mElements.first().isEmpty()) // if grid is completely empty, add first cell
2841  {
2842  expandTo(1, 1);
2843  return;
2844  }
2845 
2846  if (newIndex < 0)
2847  newIndex = 0;
2848  if (newIndex > columnCount())
2849  newIndex = columnCount();
2850 
2851  mColumnStretchFactors.insert(newIndex, 1);
2852  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2853  mElements[row].insert(newIndex, (QCPLayoutElement*)0);
2854 }
2855 
2856 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2857 void QCPLayoutGrid::updateLayout()
2858 {
2859  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights, maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
2860  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
2861  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
2862 
2863  int totalRowSpacing = (rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing;
2864  int totalColSpacing = (columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing;
2865  QVector<int> colWidths = getSectionSizes(maxColWidths, minColWidths, mColumnStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.width()-totalColSpacing);
2866  QVector<int> rowHeights = getSectionSizes(maxRowHeights, minRowHeights, mRowStretchFactors.toVector(), mRect.height()-totalRowSpacing);
2867 
2868  // go through cells and set rects accordingly:
2869  int yOffset = mRect.top();
2870  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2871  {
2872  if (row > 0)
2873  yOffset += rowHeights.at(row-1)+mRowSpacing;
2874  int xOffset = mRect.left();
2875  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2876  {
2877  if (col > 0)
2878  xOffset += colWidths.at(col-1)+mColumnSpacing;
2879  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2880  mElements.at(row).at(col)->setOuterRect(QRect(xOffset, yOffset, colWidths.at(col), rowHeights.at(row)));
2881  }
2882  }
2883 }
2884 
2885 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2886 int QCPLayoutGrid::elementCount() const
2887 {
2888  return rowCount()*columnCount();
2889 }
2890 
2891 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2892 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::elementAt(int index) const
2893 {
2894  if (index >= 0 && index < elementCount())
2895  return mElements.at(index / columnCount()).at(index % columnCount());
2896  else
2897  return 0;
2898 }
2899 
2900 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2901 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutGrid::takeAt(int index)
2902 {
2903  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
2904  {
2905  releaseElement(el);
2906  mElements[index / columnCount()][index % columnCount()] = 0;
2907  return el;
2908  } else
2909  {
2910  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
2911  return 0;
2912  }
2913 }
2914 
2915 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2916 bool QCPLayoutGrid::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
2917 {
2918  if (element)
2919  {
2920  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
2921  {
2922  if (elementAt(i) == element)
2923  {
2924  takeAt(i);
2925  return true;
2926  }
2927  }
2928  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
2929  } else
2930  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
2931  return false;
2932 }
2933 
2934 /* inherits documentation from base class */
2935 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPLayoutGrid::elements(bool recursive) const
2936 {
2937  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
2938  int colC = columnCount();
2939  int rowC = rowCount();
2940 #if QT_VERSION >= QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0)
2941  result.reserve(colC*rowC);
2942 #endif
2943  for (int row=0; row<rowC; ++row)
2944  {
2945  for (int col=0; col<colC; ++col)
2946  {
2947  result.append(mElements.at(row).at(col));
2948  }
2949  }
2950  if (recursive)
2951  {
2952  int c = result.size();
2953  for (int i=0; i<c; ++i)
2954  {
2955  if (result.at(i))
2956  result << result.at(i)->elements(recursive);
2957  }
2958  }
2959  return result;
2960 }
2961 
2965 void QCPLayoutGrid::simplify()
2966 {
2967  // remove rows with only empty cells:
2968  for (int row=rowCount()-1; row>=0; --row)
2969  {
2970  bool hasElements = false;
2971  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
2972  {
2973  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2974  {
2975  hasElements = true;
2976  break;
2977  }
2978  }
2979  if (!hasElements)
2980  {
2981  mRowStretchFactors.removeAt(row);
2982  mElements.removeAt(row);
2983  if (mElements.isEmpty()) // removed last element, also remove stretch factor (wouldn't happen below because also columnCount changed to 0 now)
2984  mColumnStretchFactors.clear();
2985  }
2986  }
2987 
2988  // remove columns with only empty cells:
2989  for (int col=columnCount()-1; col>=0; --col)
2990  {
2991  bool hasElements = false;
2992  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
2993  {
2994  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
2995  {
2996  hasElements = true;
2997  break;
2998  }
2999  }
3000  if (!hasElements)
3001  {
3002  mColumnStretchFactors.removeAt(col);
3003  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3004  mElements[row].removeAt(col);
3005  }
3006  }
3007 }
3008 
3009 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3010 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::minimumSizeHint() const
3011 {
3012  QVector<int> minColWidths, minRowHeights;
3013  getMinimumRowColSizes(&minColWidths, &minRowHeights);
3014  QSize result(0, 0);
3015  for (int i=0; i<minColWidths.size(); ++i)
3016  result.rwidth() += minColWidths.at(i);
3017  for (int i=0; i<minRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3018  result.rheight() += minRowHeights.at(i);
3019  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3020  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3021  return result;
3022 }
3023 
3024 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3025 QSize QCPLayoutGrid::maximumSizeHint() const
3026 {
3027  QVector<int> maxColWidths, maxRowHeights;
3028  getMaximumRowColSizes(&maxColWidths, &maxRowHeights);
3029 
3030  QSize result(0, 0);
3031  for (int i=0; i<maxColWidths.size(); ++i)
3032  result.setWidth(qMin(result.width()+maxColWidths.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3033  for (int i=0; i<maxRowHeights.size(); ++i)
3034  result.setHeight(qMin(result.height()+maxRowHeights.at(i), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX));
3035  result.rwidth() += qMax(0, columnCount()-1) * mColumnSpacing + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
3036  result.rheight() += qMax(0, rowCount()-1) * mRowSpacing + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
3037  return result;
3038 }
3039 
3052 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMinimumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *minColWidths, QVector<int> *minRowHeights) const
3053 {
3054  *minColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), 0);
3055  *minRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), 0);
3056  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3057  {
3058  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3059  {
3060  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3061  {
3062  QSize minHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSizeHint();
3063  QSize min = mElements.at(row).at(col)->minimumSize();
3064  QSize final(min.width() > 0 ? min.width() : minHint.width(), min.height() > 0 ? min.height() : minHint.height());
3065  if (minColWidths->at(col) < final.width())
3066  (*minColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3067  if (minRowHeights->at(row) < final.height())
3068  (*minRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3069  }
3070  }
3071  }
3072 }
3073 
3086 void QCPLayoutGrid::getMaximumRowColSizes(QVector<int> *maxColWidths, QVector<int> *maxRowHeights) const
3087 {
3088  *maxColWidths = QVector<int>(columnCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3089  *maxRowHeights = QVector<int>(rowCount(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
3090  for (int row=0; row<rowCount(); ++row)
3091  {
3092  for (int col=0; col<columnCount(); ++col)
3093  {
3094  if (mElements.at(row).at(col))
3095  {
3096  QSize maxHint = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSizeHint();
3097  QSize max = mElements.at(row).at(col)->maximumSize();
3098  QSize final(max.width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.width() : maxHint.width(), max.height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? max.height() : maxHint.height());
3099  if (maxColWidths->at(col) > final.width())
3100  (*maxColWidths)[col] = final.width();
3101  if (maxRowHeights->at(row) > final.height())
3102  (*maxRowHeights)[row] = final.height();
3103  }
3104  }
3105  }
3106 }
3107 
3108 
3112 
3130 /* start documentation of inline functions */
3131 
3138 /* end documentation of inline functions */
3139 
3143 QCPLayoutInset::QCPLayoutInset()
3144 {
3145 }
3146 
3147 QCPLayoutInset::~QCPLayoutInset()
3148 {
3149  // clear all child layout elements. This is important because only the specific layouts know how
3150  // to handle removing elements (clear calls virtual removeAt method to do that).
3151  clear();
3152 }
3153 
3157 QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement QCPLayoutInset::insetPlacement(int index) const
3158 {
3159  if (elementAt(index))
3160  return mInsetPlacement.at(index);
3161  else
3162  {
3163  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3164  return ipFree;
3165  }
3166 }
3167 
3172 Qt::Alignment QCPLayoutInset::insetAlignment(int index) const
3173 {
3174  if (elementAt(index))
3175  return mInsetAlignment.at(index);
3176  else
3177  {
3178  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3179  return 0;
3180  }
3181 }
3182 
3187 QRectF QCPLayoutInset::insetRect(int index) const
3188 {
3189  if (elementAt(index))
3190  return mInsetRect.at(index);
3191  else
3192  {
3193  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3194  return QRectF();
3195  }
3196 }
3197 
3203 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetPlacement(int index, QCPLayoutInset::InsetPlacement placement)
3204 {
3205  if (elementAt(index))
3206  mInsetPlacement[index] = placement;
3207  else
3208  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3209 }
3210 
3219 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetAlignment(int index, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3220 {
3221  if (elementAt(index))
3222  mInsetAlignment[index] = alignment;
3223  else
3224  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3225 }
3226 
3238 void QCPLayoutInset::setInsetRect(int index, const QRectF &rect)
3239 {
3240  if (elementAt(index))
3241  mInsetRect[index] = rect;
3242  else
3243  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid element index:" << index;
3244 }
3245 
3246 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3247 void QCPLayoutInset::updateLayout()
3248 {
3249  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3250  {
3251  QRect insetRect;
3252  QSize finalMinSize, finalMaxSize;
3253  QSize minSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->minimumSizeHint();
3254  QSize maxSizeHint = mElements.at(i)->maximumSizeHint();
3255  finalMinSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().width() : minSizeHint.width());
3256  finalMinSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() > 0 ? mElements.at(i)->minimumSize().height() : minSizeHint.height());
3257  finalMaxSize.setWidth(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().width() : maxSizeHint.width());
3258  finalMaxSize.setHeight(mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() < QWIDGETSIZE_MAX ? mElements.at(i)->maximumSize().height() : maxSizeHint.height());
3259  if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipFree)
3260  {
3261  insetRect = QRect(rect().x()+rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).x(),
3262  rect().y()+rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).y(),
3263  rect().width()*mInsetRect.at(i).width(),
3264  rect().height()*mInsetRect.at(i).height());
3265  if (insetRect.size().width() < finalMinSize.width())
3266  insetRect.setWidth(finalMinSize.width());
3267  if (insetRect.size().height() < finalMinSize.height())
3268  insetRect.setHeight(finalMinSize.height());
3269  if (insetRect.size().width() > finalMaxSize.width())
3270  insetRect.setWidth(finalMaxSize.width());
3271  if (insetRect.size().height() > finalMaxSize.height())
3272  insetRect.setHeight(finalMaxSize.height());
3273  } else if (mInsetPlacement.at(i) == ipBorderAligned)
3274  {
3275  insetRect.setSize(finalMinSize);
3276  Qt::Alignment al = mInsetAlignment.at(i);
3277  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignLeft)) insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x());
3278  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight)) insetRect.moveRight(rect().x()+rect().width());
3279  else insetRect.moveLeft(rect().x()+rect().width()*0.5-finalMinSize.width()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignHCenter
3280  if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignTop)) insetRect.moveTop(rect().y());
3281  else if (al.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom)) insetRect.moveBottom(rect().y()+rect().height());
3282  else insetRect.moveTop(rect().y()+rect().height()*0.5-finalMinSize.height()*0.5); // default to Qt::AlignVCenter
3283  }
3284  mElements.at(i)->setOuterRect(insetRect);
3285  }
3286 }
3287 
3288 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3289 int QCPLayoutInset::elementCount() const
3290 {
3291  return mElements.size();
3292 }
3293 
3294 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3295 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::elementAt(int index) const
3296 {
3297  if (index >= 0 && index < mElements.size())
3298  return mElements.at(index);
3299  else
3300  return 0;
3301 }
3302 
3303 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3304 QCPLayoutElement *QCPLayoutInset::takeAt(int index)
3305 {
3306  if (QCPLayoutElement *el = elementAt(index))
3307  {
3308  releaseElement(el);
3309  mElements.removeAt(index);
3310  mInsetPlacement.removeAt(index);
3311  mInsetAlignment.removeAt(index);
3312  mInsetRect.removeAt(index);
3313  return el;
3314  } else
3315  {
3316  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Attempt to take invalid index:" << index;
3317  return 0;
3318  }
3319 }
3320 
3321 /* inherits documentation from base class */
3322 bool QCPLayoutInset::take(QCPLayoutElement *element)
3323 {
3324  if (element)
3325  {
3326  for (int i=0; i<elementCount(); ++i)
3327  {
3328  if (elementAt(i) == element)
3329  {
3330  takeAt(i);
3331  return true;
3332  }
3333  }
3334  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Element not in this layout, couldn't take";
3335  } else
3336  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't take null element";
3337  return false;
3338 }
3339 
3349 double QCPLayoutInset::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
3350 {
3351  Q_UNUSED(details)
3352  if (onlySelectable)
3353  return -1;
3354 
3355  for (int i=0; i<mElements.size(); ++i)
3356  {
3357  // inset layout shall only return positive selectTest, if actually an inset object is at pos
3358  // else it would block the entire underlying QCPAxisRect with its surface.
3359  if (mElements.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable) >= 0)
3360  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
3361  }
3362  return -1;
3363 }
3364 
3376 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, Qt::Alignment alignment)
3377 {
3378  if (element)
3379  {
3380  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3381  element->layout()->take(element);
3382  mElements.append(element);
3383  mInsetPlacement.append(ipBorderAligned);
3384  mInsetAlignment.append(alignment);
3385  mInsetRect.append(QRectF(0.6, 0.6, 0.4, 0.4));
3386  adoptElement(element);
3387  } else
3388  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3389 }
3390 
3402 void QCPLayoutInset::addElement(QCPLayoutElement *element, const QRectF &rect)
3403 {
3404  if (element)
3405  {
3406  if (element->layout()) // remove from old layout first
3407  element->layout()->take(element);
3408  mElements.append(element);
3409  mInsetPlacement.append(ipFree);
3410  mInsetAlignment.append(Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
3411  mInsetRect.append(rect);
3412  adoptElement(element);
3413  } else
3414  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Can't add null element";
3415 }
3416 
3417 
3421 
3445 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding() :
3446  mStyle(esNone),
3447  mWidth(8),
3448  mLength(10),
3449  mInverted(false)
3450 {
3451 }
3452 
3456 QCPLineEnding::QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style, double width, double length, bool inverted) :
3457  mStyle(style),
3458  mWidth(width),
3459  mLength(length),
3460  mInverted(inverted)
3461 {
3462 }
3463 
3467 void QCPLineEnding::setStyle(QCPLineEnding::EndingStyle style)
3468 {
3469  mStyle = style;
3470 }
3471 
3478 void QCPLineEnding::setWidth(double width)
3479 {
3480  mWidth = width;
3481 }
3482 
3489 void QCPLineEnding::setLength(double length)
3490 {
3491  mLength = length;
3492 }
3493 
3502 void QCPLineEnding::setInverted(bool inverted)
3503 {
3504  mInverted = inverted;
3505 }
3506 
3516 double QCPLineEnding::boundingDistance() const
3517 {
3518  switch (mStyle)
3519  {
3520  case esNone:
3521  return 0;
3522 
3523  case esFlatArrow:
3524  case esSpikeArrow:
3525  case esLineArrow:
3526  case esSkewedBar:
3527  return qSqrt(mWidth*mWidth+mLength*mLength); // items that have width and length
3528 
3529  case esDisc:
3530  case esSquare:
3531  case esDiamond:
3532  case esBar:
3533  case esHalfBar:
3534  return mWidth*1.42; // items that only have a width -> width*sqrt(2)
3535 
3536  }
3537  return 0;
3538 }
3539 
3551 double QCPLineEnding::realLength() const
3552 {
3553  switch (mStyle)
3554  {
3555  case esNone:
3556  case esLineArrow:
3557  case esSkewedBar:
3558  case esBar:
3559  case esHalfBar:
3560  return 0;
3561 
3562  case esFlatArrow:
3563  return mLength;
3564 
3565  case esDisc:
3566  case esSquare:
3567  case esDiamond:
3568  return mWidth*0.5;
3569 
3570  case esSpikeArrow:
3571  return mLength*0.8;
3572  }
3573  return 0;
3574 }
3575 
3581 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, const QVector2D &dir) const
3582 {
3583  if (mStyle == esNone)
3584  return;
3585 
3586  QVector2D lengthVec(dir.normalized());
3587  if (lengthVec.isNull())
3588  lengthVec = QVector2D(1, 0);
3589  QVector2D widthVec(-lengthVec.y(), lengthVec.x());
3590  lengthVec *= mLength*(mInverted ? -1 : 1);
3591  widthVec *= mWidth*0.5*(mInverted ? -1 : 1);
3592 
3593  QPen penBackup = painter->pen();
3594  QBrush brushBackup = painter->brush();
3595  QPen miterPen = penBackup;
3596  miterPen.setJoinStyle(Qt::MiterJoin); // to make arrow heads spikey
3597  QBrush brush(painter->pen().color(), Qt::SolidPattern);
3598  switch (mStyle)
3599  {
3600  case esNone: break;
3601  case esFlatArrow:
3602  {
3603  QPointF points[3] = {pos.toPointF(),
3604  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3605  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3606  };
3607  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3608  painter->setBrush(brush);
3609  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 3);
3610  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3611  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3612  break;
3613  }
3614  case esSpikeArrow:
3615  {
3616  QPointF points[4] = {pos.toPointF(),
3617  (pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3618  (pos-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(),
3619  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3620  };
3621  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3622  painter->setBrush(brush);
3623  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3624  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3625  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3626  break;
3627  }
3628  case esLineArrow:
3629  {
3630  QPointF points[3] = {(pos-lengthVec+widthVec).toPointF(),
3631  pos.toPointF(),
3632  (pos-lengthVec-widthVec).toPointF()
3633  };
3634  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3635  painter->drawPolyline(points, 3);
3636  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3637  break;
3638  }
3639  case esDisc:
3640  {
3641  painter->setBrush(brush);
3642  painter->drawEllipse(pos.toPointF(), mWidth*0.5, mWidth*0.5);
3643  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3644  break;
3645  }
3646  case esSquare:
3647  {
3648  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3649  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF(),
3650  (pos-widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3651  (pos+widthVecPerp-widthVec).toPointF(),
3652  (pos+widthVecPerp+widthVec).toPointF()
3653  };
3654  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3655  painter->setBrush(brush);
3656  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3657  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3658  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3659  break;
3660  }
3661  case esDiamond:
3662  {
3663  QVector2D widthVecPerp(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
3664  QPointF points[4] = {(pos-widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3665  (pos-widthVec).toPointF(),
3666  (pos+widthVecPerp).toPointF(),
3667  (pos+widthVec).toPointF()
3668  };
3669  painter->setPen(miterPen);
3670  painter->setBrush(brush);
3671  painter->drawConvexPolygon(points, 4);
3672  painter->setBrush(brushBackup);
3673  painter->setPen(penBackup);
3674  break;
3675  }
3676  case esBar:
3677  {
3678  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), (pos-widthVec).toPointF());
3679  break;
3680  }
3681  case esHalfBar:
3682  {
3683  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec).toPointF(), pos.toPointF());
3684  break;
3685  }
3686  case esSkewedBar:
3687  {
3688  if (qFuzzyIsNull(painter->pen().widthF()) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic))
3689  {
3690  // if drawing with cosmetic pen (perfectly thin stroke, happens only in vector exports), draw bar exactly on tip of line
3691  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF(),
3692  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)).toPointF());
3693  } else
3694  {
3695  // if drawing with thick (non-cosmetic) pen, shift bar a little in line direction to prevent line from sticking through bar slightly
3696  painter->drawLine((pos+widthVec+lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0, (double)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5).toPointF(),
3697  (pos-widthVec-lengthVec*0.2*(mInverted?-1:1)+dir.normalized()*qMax(1.0, (double)painter->pen().widthF())*0.5).toPointF());
3698  }
3699  break;
3700  }
3701  }
3702 }
3703 
3709 void QCPLineEnding::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector2D &pos, double angle) const
3710 {
3711  draw(painter, pos, QVector2D(qCos(angle), qSin(angle)));
3712 }
3713 
3714 
3718 
3737 QCPGrid::QCPGrid(QCPAxis *parentAxis) :
3738  QCPLayerable(parentAxis->parentPlot(), "", parentAxis),
3739  mParentAxis(parentAxis)
3740 {
3741  // warning: this is called in QCPAxis constructor, so parentAxis members should not be accessed/called
3742  setParent(parentAxis);
3743  setPen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3744  setSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220,220,220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
3745  setZeroLinePen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::SolidLine));
3746  setSubGridVisible(false);
3747  setAntialiased(false);
3748  setAntialiasedSubGrid(false);
3749  setAntialiasedZeroLine(false);
3750 }
3751 
3757 void QCPGrid::setSubGridVisible(bool visible)
3758 {
3759  mSubGridVisible = visible;
3760 }
3761 
3765 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedSubGrid(bool enabled)
3766 {
3767  mAntialiasedSubGrid = enabled;
3768 }
3769 
3773 void QCPGrid::setAntialiasedZeroLine(bool enabled)
3774 {
3775  mAntialiasedZeroLine = enabled;
3776 }
3777 
3781 void QCPGrid::setPen(const QPen &pen)
3782 {
3783  mPen = pen;
3784 }
3785 
3789 void QCPGrid::setSubGridPen(const QPen &pen)
3790 {
3791  mSubGridPen = pen;
3792 }
3793 
3800 void QCPGrid::setZeroLinePen(const QPen &pen)
3801 {
3802  mZeroLinePen = pen;
3803 }
3804 
3818 void QCPGrid::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
3819 {
3820  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeGrid);
3821 }
3822 
3828 void QCPGrid::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
3829 {
3830  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3831 
3832  if (mSubGridVisible)
3833  drawSubGridLines(painter);
3834  drawGridLines(painter);
3835 }
3836 
3843 void QCPGrid::drawGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3844 {
3845  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3846 
3847  int lowTick = mParentAxis->mLowestVisibleTick;
3848  int highTick = mParentAxis->mHighestVisibleTick;
3849  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3850  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3851  {
3852  // draw zeroline:
3853  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3854  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3855  {
3856  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3857  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3858  double epsilon = mParentAxis->range().size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3859  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3860  {
3861  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3862  {
3863  zeroLineIndex = i;
3864  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3865  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3866  break;
3867  }
3868  }
3869  }
3870  // draw grid lines:
3871  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3872  painter->setPen(mPen);
3873  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3874  {
3875  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3876  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // x
3877  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3878  }
3879  } else
3880  {
3881  // draw zeroline:
3882  int zeroLineIndex = -1;
3883  if (mZeroLinePen.style() != Qt::NoPen && mParentAxis->mRange.lower < 0 && mParentAxis->mRange.upper > 0)
3884  {
3885  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
3886  painter->setPen(mZeroLinePen);
3887  double epsilon = mParentAxis->mRange.size()*1E-6; // for comparing double to zero
3888  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3889  {
3890  if (qAbs(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)) < epsilon)
3891  {
3892  zeroLineIndex = i;
3893  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3894  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3895  break;
3896  }
3897  }
3898  }
3899  // draw grid lines:
3900  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
3901  painter->setPen(mPen);
3902  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
3903  {
3904  if (i == zeroLineIndex) continue; // don't draw a gridline on top of the zeroline
3905  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mTickVector.at(i)); // y
3906  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3907  }
3908  }
3909 }
3910 
3917 void QCPGrid::drawSubGridLines(QCPPainter *painter) const
3918 {
3919  if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
3920 
3921  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedSubGrid, QCP::aeSubGrid);
3922  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
3923  painter->setPen(mSubGridPen);
3924  if (mParentAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
3925  {
3926  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
3927  {
3928  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // x
3929  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->bottom(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->top()));
3930  }
3931  } else
3932  {
3933  for (int i=0; i<mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
3934  {
3935  t = mParentAxis->coordToPixel(mParentAxis->mSubTickVector.at(i)); // y
3936  painter->drawLine(QLineF(mParentAxis->mAxisRect->left(), t, mParentAxis->mAxisRect->right(), t));
3937  }
3938  }
3939 }
3940 
3941 
3945 
3964 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
3965 
3978 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
3979 /* start of documentation of signals */
3980 
4009 /* end of documentation of signals */
4010 
4015 QCPAxis::QCPAxis(QCPAxisRect *parent, AxisType type) :
4016  QCPLayerable(parent->parentPlot(), "", parent),
4017  // axis base:
4018  mAxisType(type),
4019  mAxisRect(parent),
4020  mOffset(0),
4021  mPadding(5),
4022  mOrientation((type == atBottom || type == atTop) ? Qt::Horizontal : Qt::Vertical),
4023  mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
4024  mSelectedParts(spNone),
4025  mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4026  mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4027  mLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
4028  mUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
4029  // axis label:
4030  mLabelPadding(0),
4031  mLabel(""),
4032  mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4033  mSelectedLabelFont(QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4034  mLabelColor(Qt::black),
4035  mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4036  // tick labels:
4037  mTickLabelPadding(0),
4038  mTickLabels(true),
4039  mAutoTickLabels(true),
4040  mTickLabelRotation(0),
4041  mTickLabelType(ltNumber),
4042  mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
4043  mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(), mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
4044  mTickLabelColor(Qt::black),
4045  mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
4046  mDateTimeFormat("hh:mm:ss\ndd.MM.yy"),
4047  mNumberPrecision(6),
4048  mNumberFormatChar('g'),
4049  mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
4050  mNumberMultiplyCross(false),
4051  // ticks and subticks:
4052  mTicks(true),
4053  mTickStep(1),
4054  mSubTickCount(4),
4055  mAutoTickCount(6),
4056  mAutoTicks(true),
4057  mAutoTickStep(true),
4058  mAutoSubTicks(true),
4059  mTickLengthIn(5),
4060  mTickLengthOut(0),
4061  mSubTickLengthIn(2),
4062  mSubTickLengthOut(0),
4063  mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4064  mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4065  mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
4066  mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
4067  // scale and range:
4068  mRange(0, 5),
4069  mRangeReversed(false),
4070  mScaleType(stLinear),
4071  mScaleLogBase(10),
4072  mScaleLogBaseLogInv(1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase)),
4073  // internal members:
4074  mGrid(new QCPGrid(this)),
4075  mLabelCache(16), // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
4076  mLowestVisibleTick(0),
4077  mHighestVisibleTick(-1),
4078  mExponentialChar('e'), // will be updated with locale sensitive values in setupTickVector
4079  mPositiveSignChar('+'), // will be updated with locale sensitive values in setupTickVector
4080  mCachedMarginValid(false),
4081  mCachedMargin(0)
4082 {
4083  mGrid->setVisible(false);
4084  setAntialiased(false);
4085  setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer()); // it's actually on that layer already, but we want it in front of the grid, so we place it on there again
4086 
4087  if (type == atTop)
4088  {
4089  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4090  setLabelPadding(6);
4091  } else if (type == atRight)
4092  {
4093  setTickLabelPadding(7);
4094  setLabelPadding(12);
4095  } else if (type == atBottom)
4096  {
4097  setTickLabelPadding(3);
4098  setLabelPadding(3);
4099  } else if (type == atLeft)
4100  {
4101  setTickLabelPadding(5);
4102  setLabelPadding(10);
4103  }
4104 }
4105 
4106 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
4107 QString QCPAxis::numberFormat() const
4108 {
4109  QString result;
4110  result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
4111  if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
4112  {
4113  result.append("b");
4114  if (mNumberMultiplyCross)
4115  result.append("c");
4116  }
4117  return result;
4118 }
4119 
4133 void QCPAxis::setScaleType(ScaleType type)
4134 {
4135  if (mScaleType != type)
4136  {
4137  mScaleType = type;
4138  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4139  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4140  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4141  }
4142 }
4143 
4151 void QCPAxis::setScaleLogBase(double base)
4152 {
4153  if (base > 1)
4154  {
4155  mScaleLogBase = base;
4156  mScaleLogBaseLogInv = 1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase); // buffer for faster baseLog() calculation
4157  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4158  } else
4159  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid logarithmic scale base (must be greater 1):" << base;
4160 }
4161 
4170 void QCPAxis::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
4171 {
4172  if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
4173  return;
4174 
4175  if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
4176  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4177  {
4178  mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
4179  } else
4180  {
4181  mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
4182  }
4183  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4184  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4185 }
4186 
4197 void QCPAxis::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
4198 {
4199  mSelectableParts = selectable;
4200 }
4201 
4217 void QCPAxis::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
4218 {
4219  if (mSelectedParts != selected)
4220  {
4221  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) != selected.testFlag(spTickLabels))
4222  mLabelCache.clear();
4223  mSelectedParts = selected;
4224  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
4225  }
4226 }
4227 
4237 void QCPAxis::setRange(double lower, double upper)
4238 {
4239  if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
4240  return;
4241 
4242  if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
4243  mRange.lower = lower;
4244  mRange.upper = upper;
4245  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4246  {
4247  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4248  } else
4249  {
4250  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4251  }
4252  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4253  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4254 }
4255 
4267 void QCPAxis::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
4268 {
4269  if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
4270  setRange(position, position+size);
4271  else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
4272  setRange(position-size, position);
4273  else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
4274  setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
4275 }
4276 
4281 void QCPAxis::setRangeLower(double lower)
4282 {
4283  if (mRange.lower == lower)
4284  return;
4285 
4286  mRange.lower = lower;
4287  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4288  {
4289  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4290  } else
4291  {
4292  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4293  }
4294  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4295  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4296 }
4297 
4302 void QCPAxis::setRangeUpper(double upper)
4303 {
4304  if (mRange.upper == upper)
4305  return;
4306 
4307  mRange.upper = upper;
4308  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
4309  {
4310  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
4311  } else
4312  {
4313  mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
4314  }
4315  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4316  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
4317 }
4318 
4328 void QCPAxis::setRangeReversed(bool reversed)
4329 {
4330  if (mRangeReversed != reversed)
4331  {
4332  mRangeReversed = reversed;
4333  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4334  }
4335 }

4353  {
4354  mAutoTicks = on;
4355  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4356  }

4368 void QCPAxis::setAutoTickCount(int approximateCount)
4369 {

4371  {
4372  if (approximateCount > 0)
4373  {
4374  mAutoTickCount = approximateCount;
4375  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4376  } else
4377  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "approximateCount must be greater than zero:" << approximateCount;
4378  }
4379 }

4505  }

4513 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelFont(const QFont &font)
4514 {
4515  if (font != mTickLabelFont)
4516  {
4517  mTickLabelFont = font;
4518  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4519  mLabelCache.clear();
4520  }
4521 }

4528 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelColor(const QColor &color)
4529 {
4530  if (color != mTickLabelColor)
4531  {
4532  mTickLabelColor = color;
4533  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4534  mLabelCache.clear();
4535  }
4536 }
4537 
4547 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelRotation(double degrees)
4548 {
4549  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(degrees-mTickLabelRotation))
4550  {
4551  mTickLabelRotation = qBound(-90.0, degrees, 90.0);
4552  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4553  mLabelCache.clear();
4554  }
4555 }
4556 
4563 void QCPAxis::setDateTimeFormat(const QString &format)
4564 {
4565  if (mDateTimeFormat != format)
4566  {
4567  mDateTimeFormat = format;
4568  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4569  mLabelCache.clear();
4570  }
4571 }
4572 
4609 void QCPAxis::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
4610 {
4611  if (formatCode.isEmpty())
4612  {
4613  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
4614  return;
4615  }
4616  mLabelCache.clear();
4617  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4618 
4619  // interpret first char as number format char:
4620  QString allowedFormatChars = "eEfgG";
4621  if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
4622  {
4623  mNumberFormatChar = formatCode.at(0).toLatin1();
4624  } else
4625  {
4626  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
4627  return;
4628  }
4629  if (formatCode.length() < 2)
4630  {
4631  mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
4632  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4633  return;
4634  }
4635 
4636  // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
4637  if (formatCode.at(1) == 'b' && (mNumberFormatChar == 'e' || mNumberFormatChar == 'g'))
4638  {
4639  mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
4640  } else
4641  {
4642  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
4643  return;
4644  }
4645  if (formatCode.length() < 3)
4646  {
4647  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4648  return;
4649  }
4650 
4651  // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
4652  if (formatCode.at(2) == 'c')
4653  {
4654  mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
4655  } else if (formatCode.at(2) == 'd')
4656  {
4657  mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
4658  } else
4659  {
4660  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
4661  return;
4662  }
4663 }
4664 
4676 void QCPAxis::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
4677 {
4678  if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
4679  {
4680  mNumberPrecision = precision;
4681  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4682  }
4683 }
4684

4693  {
4694  mTickStep = step;
4695  mCachedMarginValid = false;
4696  }
4697 }
