5073 
5081 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
5082 {
5083  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5084  {
5085  mRange.lower += diff;
5086  mRange.upper += diff;
5087  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5088  {
5089  mRange.lower *= diff;
5090  mRange.upper *= diff;
5091  }
5092  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5093  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5094 }
5095 
5102 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
5103 {
5104  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5105  {
5106  QCPRange newRange;
5107  newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
5108  newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
5109  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5110  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
5111  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5112  {
5113  if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
5114  {
5115  QCPRange newRange;
5116  newRange.lower = pow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
5117  newRange.upper = pow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
5118  if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
5119  mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
5120  } else
5121  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
5122  }
5123  mCachedMarginValid = false;
5124  emit rangeChanged(mRange);
5125 }
5126 
5140 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
5141 {
5142  int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
5143 
5144  if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5145  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
5146  else
5147  otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
5148 
5149  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5150  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
5151  else
5152  ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
5153 
5154  double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->range().size()*ownPixelSize/(double)otherPixelSize;
5155  setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
5156 }
5157 
5161 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
5162 {
5163  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5164  {
5165  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5166  {
5167  if (!mRangeReversed)
5168  return (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5169  else
5170  return -(value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5171  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5172  {
5173  if (!mRangeReversed)
5174  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->left())/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.lower;
5175  else
5176  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->left()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->width())*mRange.upper;
5177  }
5178  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5179  {
5180  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5181  {
5182  if (!mRangeReversed)
5183  return (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
5184  else
5185  return -(mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
5186  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5187  {
5188  if (!mRangeReversed)
5189  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.lower;
5190  else
5191  return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->bottom())/(double)mAxisRect->height())*mRange.upper;
5192  }
5193  }
5194 }
5195 
5199 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
5200 {
5201  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5202  {
5203  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5204  {
5205  if (!mRangeReversed)
5206  return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5207  else
5208  return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5209  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5210  {
5211  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5212  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right()+200 : mAxisRect->left()-200;
5213  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5214  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left()-200 : mAxisRect->right()+200;
5215  else
5216  {
5217  if (!mRangeReversed)
5218  return baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5219  else
5220  return baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
5221  }
5222  }
5223  } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
5224  {
5225  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5226  {
5227  if (!mRangeReversed)
5228  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5229  else
5230  return mAxisRect->bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
5231  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5232  {
5233  if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5234  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top()-200 : mAxisRect->bottom()+200;
5235  else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
5236  return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom()+200 : mAxisRect->top()-200;
5237  else
5238  {
5239  if (!mRangeReversed)
5240  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5241  else
5242  return mAxisRect->bottom()-baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
5243  }
5244  }
5245  }
5246 }
5247 
5257 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
5258 {
5259  if (!mVisible)
5260  return spNone;
5261 
5262  if (mAxisSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5263  return spAxis;
5264  else if (mTickLabelsSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5265  return spTickLabels;
5266  else if (mLabelSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
5267  return spAxisLabel;
5268  else
5269  return spNone;
5270 }
5271 
5272 /* inherits documentation from base class */
5273 double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
5274 {
5275  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
5276  SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
5277  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
5278  return -1;
5279 
5280  if (details)
5281  details->setValue(part);
5282  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
5283 }
5284 
5292 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxis::plottables() const
5293 {
5294  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
5295  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5296 
5297  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
5298  {
5299  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5300  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
5301  }
5302  return result;
5303 }
5304 
5310 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxis::graphs() const
5311 {
5312  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
5313  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5314 
5315  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
5316  {
5317  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis() == this)
5318  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
5319  }
5320  return result;
5321 }
5322 
5329 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCPAxis::items() const
5330 {
5331  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
5332  if (!mParentPlot) return result;
5333 
5334  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
5335  {
5336  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
5337  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++itemId)
5338  {
5339  if (positions.at(posId)->keyAxis() == this || positions.at(posId)->valueAxis() == this)
5340  {
5341  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
5342  break;
5343  }
5344  }
5345  }
5346  return result;
5347 }
5348 
5353 QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side)
5354 {
5355  switch (side)
5356  {
5357  case QCP::msLeft: return atLeft;
5358  case QCP::msRight: return atRight;
5359  case QCP::msTop: return atTop;
5360  case QCP::msBottom: return atBottom;
5361  default: break;
5362  }
5363  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << (int)side;
5364  return atLeft;
5365 }
5366 
5374 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
5375 {
5376  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5377  if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
5378 
5379  // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill the vectors himself
5380  if (mAutoTicks)
5381  {
5382  generateAutoTicks();
5383  } else
5384  {
5385  emit ticksRequest();
5386  }
5387 
5388  visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
5389  if (mTickVector.isEmpty())
5390  {
5391  mSubTickVector.clear();
5392  return;
5393  }
5394 
5395  // generate subticks between ticks:
5396  mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size()-1)*mSubTickCount);
5397  if (mSubTickCount > 0)
5398  {
5399  double subTickStep = 0;
5400  double subTickPosition = 0;
5401  int subTickIndex = 0;
5402  bool done = false;
5403  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick > 0 ? mLowestVisibleTick-1 : mLowestVisibleTick;
5404  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick < mTickVector.size()-1 ? mHighestVisibleTick+1 : mHighestVisibleTick;
5405  for (int i=lowTick+1; i<=highTick; ++i)
5406  {
5407  subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i)-mTickVector.at(i-1))/(double)(mSubTickCount+1);
5408  for (int k=1; k<=mSubTickCount; ++k)
5409  {
5410  subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i-1) + k*subTickStep;
5411  if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
5412  continue;
5413  if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper)
5414  {
5415  done = true;
5416  break;
5417  }
5418  mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
5419  subTickIndex++;
5420  }
5421  if (done) break;
5422  }
5423  mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
5424  }
5425 
5426  // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
5427  mExponentialChar = mParentPlot->locale().exponential(); // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in getTickLabelData()
5428  mPositiveSignChar = mParentPlot->locale().positiveSign(); // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in getTickLabelData()
5429  if (mAutoTickLabels)
5430  {
5431  int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
5432  mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
5433  if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5434  {
5435  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5436  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision);
5437  } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime)
5438  {
5439  for (int i=mLowestVisibleTick; i<=mHighestVisibleTick; ++i)
5440  {
5441 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function if available, to gain sub-second accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
5442  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)), mDateTimeFormat);
5443 #else
5444  mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i)*1000), mDateTimeFormat);
5445 #endif
5446  }
5447  }
5448  } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
5449  {
5450  if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so emit ticksRequest here for labels
5451  {
5452  emit ticksRequest();
5453  }
5454  // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
5455  if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
5456  mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
5457  }
5458 }
5459 
5469 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks()
5470 {
5471  if (mScaleType == stLinear)
5472  {
5473  if (mAutoTickStep)
5474  {
5475  // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
5476  mTickStep = mRange.size()/(double)(mAutoTickCount+1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on average, the small addition is to prevent jitter on exact integers
5477  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(mTickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5478  double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5479  if (tickStepMantissa < 5)
5480  {
5481  // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
5482  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa*2)/2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5483  } else
5484  {
5485  // round to first digit in multiples of 2
5486  mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa/2.0)*2.0*magnitudeFactor;
5487  }
5488  }
5489  if (mAutoSubTicks)
5490  mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
5491  // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
5492  qint64 firstStep = floor(mRange.lower/mTickStep);
5493  qint64 lastStep = ceil(mRange.upper/mTickStep);
5494  int tickcount = lastStep-firstStep+1;
5495  if (tickcount < 0) tickcount = 0;
5496  mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
5497  for (int i=0; i<tickcount; ++i)
5498  mTickVector[i] = (firstStep+i)*mTickStep;
5499  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
5500  {
5501  // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
5502  if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
5503  {
5504  double lowerMag = basePow((int)floor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
5505  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5506  mTickVector.clear();
5507  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5508  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5509  {
5510  currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
5511  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5512  }
5513  } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
5514  {
5515  double lowerMag = -basePow((int)ceil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
5516  double currentMag = lowerMag;
5517  mTickVector.clear();
5518  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5519  while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
5520  {
5521  currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
5522  mTickVector.append(currentMag);
5523  }
5524  } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have different sign
5525  {
5526  mTickVector.clear();
5527  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-" << mRange.upper;
5528  }
5529  }
5530 }
5531 
5545 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const
5546 {
5547  int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value can be found
5548 
5549  // get mantissa of tickstep:
5550  double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(tickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
5551  double tickStepMantissa = tickStep/magnitudeFactor;
5552 
5553  // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
5554  double epsilon = 0.01;
5555  double intPartf;
5556  int intPart;
5557  double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
5558  intPart = intPartf;
5559 
5560  // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
5561  if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5562  {
5563  if (1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
5564  ++intPart;
5565  switch (intPart)
5566  {
5567  case 1: result = 4; break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
5568  case 2: result = 3; break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
5569  case 3: result = 2; break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
5570  case 4: result = 3; break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
5571  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
5572  case 6: result = 2; break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
5573  case 7: result = 6; break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
5574  case 8: result = 3; break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
5575  case 9: result = 2; break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
5576  }
5577  } else
5578  {
5579  // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
5580  if (qAbs(fracPart-0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
5581  {
5582  switch (intPart)
5583  {
5584  case 1: result = 2; break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
5585  case 2: result = 4; break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
5586  case 3: result = 4; break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
5587  case 4: result = 2; break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
5588  case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here on)
5589  case 6: result = 4; break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
5590  case 7: result = 2; break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
5591  case 8: result = 4; break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
5592  case 9: result = 4; break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
5593  }
5594  }
5595  // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick marks, leave default
5596  }
5597 
5598  return result;
5599 }
5600 
5608 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
5609 {
5610  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5611  QPoint origin;
5612  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5613  origin = mAxisRect->bottomLeft()+QPoint(-mOffset, 0);
5614  else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5615  origin = mAxisRect->bottomRight()+QPoint(+mOffset, 0);
5616  else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5617  origin = mAxisRect->topLeft()+QPoint(0, -mOffset);
5618  else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5619  origin = mAxisRect->bottomLeft()+QPoint(0, +mOffset);
5620 
5621  double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
5622  switch (mAxisType)
5623  {
5624  case atTop: yCor = -1; break;
5625  case atRight: xCor = 1; break;
5626  default: break;
5627  }
5628 
5629  int margin = 0;
5630  int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
5631  int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
5632  double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
5633 
5634  // draw baseline:
5635  QLineF baseLine;
5636  painter->setPen(getBasePen());
5637  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5638  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(mAxisRect->width()+xCor, yCor));
5639  else
5640  baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -mAxisRect->height()+yCor));
5641  if (mRangeReversed)
5642  baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference for line itself, but for line endings later
5643  painter->drawLine(baseLine);
5644 
5645  // draw ticks:
5646  if (mTicks)
5647  {
5648  painter->setPen(getTickPen());
5649  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
5650  int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
5651  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5652  {
5653  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5654  {
5655  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // x
5656  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
5657  }
5658  } else
5659  {
5660  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5661  {
5662  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // y
5663  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
5664  }
5665  }
5666  }
5667 
5668  // draw subticks:
5669  if (mTicks && mSubTickCount > 0)
5670  {
5671  painter->setPen(getSubTickPen());
5672  // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
5673  int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
5674  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5675  {
5676  for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i) // no need to check bounds because subticks are always only created inside current mRange
5677  {
5678  t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
5679  painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
5680  }
5681  } else
5682  {
5683  for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
5684  {
5685  t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
5686  painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
5687  }
5688  }
5689  }
5690  margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
5691 
5692  // draw axis base endings:
5693  bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
5694  painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even if base and ticks themselves aren't
5695  painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen().color()));
5696  QVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
5697  if (mLowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
5698  mLowerEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p1())-baseLineVector.normalized()*mLowerEnding.realLength()*(mLowerEnding.inverted()?-1:1), -baseLineVector);
5699  if (mUpperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
5700  mUpperEnding.draw(painter, QVector2D(baseLine.p2())+baseLineVector.normalized()*mUpperEnding.realLength()*(mUpperEnding.inverted()?-1:1), baseLineVector);
5701  painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
5702 
5703  // tick labels:
5704  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
5705  if (mTickLabels)
5706  {
5707  margin += mTickLabelPadding;
5708  painter->setFont(getTickLabelFont());
5709  painter->setPen(QPen(getTickLabelColor()));
5710  for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
5711  {
5712  t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i));
5713  placeTickLabel(painter, t, margin, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
5714  }
5715  }
5716  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5717  margin += tickLabelsSize.height();
5718  else
5719  margin += tickLabelsSize.width();
5720 
5721  // axis label:
5722  QRect labelBounds;
5723  if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
5724  {
5725  margin += mLabelPadding;
5726  painter->setFont(getLabelFont());
5727  painter->setPen(QPen(getLabelColor()));
5728  labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, mLabel);
5729  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5730  {
5731  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5732  painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
5733  painter->rotate(-90);
5734  painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect->height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5735  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5736  }
5737  else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5738  {
5739  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5740  painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-mAxisRect->height());
5741  painter->rotate(90);
5742  painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect->height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5743  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5744  }
5745  else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5746  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), mAxisRect->width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5747  else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5748  painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, mAxisRect->width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
5749  }
5750 
5751  // set selection boxes:
5752  int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut), mParentPlot->selectionTolerance());
5753  int selAxisInSize = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
5754  int selTickLabelSize = (orientation()==Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
5755  int selTickLabelOffset = qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut)+mTickLabelPadding;
5756  int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
5757  int selLabelOffset = selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize+mLabelPadding;
5758  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
5759  {
5760  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->bottom());
5761  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5762  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()-selLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5763  } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
5764  {
5765  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->bottom());
5766  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5767  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect->top(), origin.x()+selLabelOffset, mAxisRect->bottom());
5768  } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
5769  {
5770  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selAxisInSize);
5771  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset);
5772  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset);
5773  } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
5774  {
5775  mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selAxisOutSize);
5776  mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset);
5777  mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect->left(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect->right(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset);
5778  }
5779  // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
5780  //painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
5781  //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
5782 }
5783 
5803 void QCPAxis::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
5804 {
5805  // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
5806  if (!mParentPlot) return;
5807  if (text.isEmpty()) return;
5808  QSize finalSize;
5809  QPointF labelAnchor;
5810  switch (mAxisType)
5811  {
5812  case atLeft: labelAnchor = QPointF(mAxisRect->left()-distanceToAxis-mOffset, position); break;
5813  case atRight: labelAnchor = QPointF(mAxisRect->right()+distanceToAxis+mOffset, position); break;
5814  case atTop: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, mAxisRect->top()-distanceToAxis-mOffset); break;
5815  case atBottom: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, mAxisRect->bottom()+distanceToAxis+mOffset); break;
5816  }
5817  if (parentPlot()->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
5818  {
5819  if (!mLabelCache.contains(text)) // no cached label exists, create it
5820  {
5821  CachedLabel *newCachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
5822  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
5823  QPointF drawOffset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
5824  newCachedLabel->offset = drawOffset+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
5825  newCachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
5826  newCachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
5827  QCPPainter cachePainter(&newCachedLabel->pixmap);
5828  cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
5829  drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(), -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
5830  mLabelCache.insert(text, newCachedLabel, 1);
5831  }
5832  // draw cached label:
5833  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
5834  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
5835  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5836  {
5837  if (labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x()+cachedLabel->pixmap.width() > mParentPlot->viewport().right() ||
5838  labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x() < mParentPlot->viewport().left())
5839  return;
5840  } else
5841  {
5842  if (labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y()+cachedLabel->pixmap.height() > mParentPlot->viewport().bottom() ||
5843  labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y() < mParentPlot->viewport().top())
5844  return;
5845  }
5846  painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor+cachedLabel->offset, cachedLabel->pixmap);
5847  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
5848  } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
5849  {
5850  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
5851  QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
5852  // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
5853  if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
5854  {
5855  if (finalPosition.x()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) > mParentPlot->viewport().right() ||
5856  finalPosition.x()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() < mParentPlot->viewport().left())
5857  return;
5858  } else
5859  {
5860  if (finalPosition.y()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) > mParentPlot->viewport().bottom() ||
5861  finalPosition.y()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() < mParentPlot->viewport().top())
5862  return;
5863  }
5864  drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
5865  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
5866  }
5867 
5868  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
5869  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
5870  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
5871  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
5872  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
5873 }
5874 
5884 void QCPAxis::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const QCPAxis::TickLabelData &labelData) const
5885 {
5886  // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
5887  QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
5888  QFont oldFont = painter->font();
5889 
5890  // transform painter to position/rotation:
5891  painter->translate(x, y);
5892  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
5893  painter->rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
5894 
5895  // draw text:
5896  if (!labelData.expPart.isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
5897  {
5898  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
5899  painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
5900  painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
5901  painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1, 0, labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
5902  } else
5903  {
5904  painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
5905  painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(), labelData.totalBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
5906  }
5907 
5908  // reset painter settings to what it was before:
5909  painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
5910  painter->setFont(oldFont);
5911 }
5912 
5921 QCPAxis::TickLabelData QCPAxis::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font, const QString &text) const
5922 {
5923  TickLabelData result;
5924 
5925  // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
5926  bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
5927  int ePos = -1;
5928  if (mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
5929  {
5930  ePos = text.indexOf('e');
5931  if (ePos > -1)
5932  useBeautifulPowers = true;
5933  }
5934 
5935  // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
5936  result.baseFont = font;
5937  result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding
5938  if (useBeautifulPowers)
5939  {
5940  // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
5941  result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
5942  // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
5943  if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic && result.basePart == "1")
5944  result.basePart = "10";
5945  else
5946  result.basePart += (mNumberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
5947  result.expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
5948  // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
5949  while (result.expPart.at(1) == '0' && result.expPart.length() > 2) // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
5950  result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
5951  if (result.expPart.at(0) == mPositiveSignChar)
5952  result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
5953  // prepare smaller font for exponent:
5954  result.expFont = font;
5955  result.expFont.setPointSize(result.expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
5956  // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
5957  result.baseBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
5958  result.expBounds = QFontMetrics(result.expFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
5959  result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, result.expBounds.width()+2, 0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
5960  } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
5961  {
5962  result.basePart = text;
5963  result.totalBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, result.basePart);
5964  }
5965  result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top left at origin, independent of how it was created, to make further processing simpler
5966 
5967  // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
5968  result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
5969  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
5970  {
5971  QTransform transform;
5972  transform.rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
5973  result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
5974  }
5975 
5976  return result;
5977 }
5978 
5989 QPointF QCPAxis::getTickLabelDrawOffset(const QCPAxis::TickLabelData &labelData) const
5990 {
5991  /*
5992  calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short
5993  explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed
5994  horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the
5995  axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height
5996  is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text
5997  will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same
5998  time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick
5999  labels.
6000  */
6001  bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation);
6002  bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(mTickLabelRotation), 90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates vertical label centering on vertical axes.
6003  double radians = mTickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
6004  int x=0, y=0;
6005  if (mAxisType == atLeft)
6006  {
6007  if (doRotation)
6008  {
6009  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6010  {
6011  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6012  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6013  } else
6014  {
6015  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6016  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6017  }
6018  } else
6019  {
6020  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
6021  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6022  }
6023  } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
6024  {
6025  if (doRotation)
6026  {
6027  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6028  {
6029  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6030  y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6031  } else
6032  {
6033  x = 0;
6034  y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6035  }
6036  } else
6037  {
6038  x = 0;
6039  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6040  }
6041  } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
6042  {
6043  if (doRotation)
6044  {
6045  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6046  {
6047  x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()+qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6048  y = -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6049  } else
6050  {
6051  x = -qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6052  y = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
6053  }
6054  } else
6055  {
6056  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6057  y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
6058  }
6059  } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
6060  {
6061  if (doRotation)
6062  {
6063  if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
6064  {
6065  x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6066  y = 0;
6067  } else
6068  {
6069  x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
6070  y = +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
6071  }
6072  } else
6073  {
6074  x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
6075  y = 0;
6076  }
6077  }
6078 
6079  return QPointF(x, y);
6080 }
6081 
6089 void QCPAxis::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
6090 {
6091  // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the placeTickLabel function.
6092  QSize finalSize;
6093  if (parentPlot()->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
6094  {
6095  const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
6096  finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size();
6097  } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
6098  {
6099  TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
6100  finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
6101  }
6102 
6103  // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
6104  if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
6105  tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
6106  if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
6107  tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
6108 }
6109 
6110 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6111 void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
6112 {
6113  Q_UNUSED(event)
6114  SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
6115  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
6116  {
6117  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6118  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
6119  if (selectionStateChanged)
6120  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6121  }
6122 }
6123 
6124 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6125 void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
6126 {
6127  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
6128  setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
6129  if (selectionStateChanged)
6130  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
6131 }
6132 
6146 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
6147 {
6148  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
6149 }
6150 
6167 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const
6168 {
6169  bool lowFound = false;
6170  bool highFound = false;
6171  lowIndex = 0;
6172  highIndex = -1;
6173 
6174  for (int i=0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i)
6175  {
6176  if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower)
6177  {
6178  lowFound = true;
6179  lowIndex = i;
6180  break;
6181  }
6182  }
6183  for (int i=mTickVector.size()-1; i >= 0; --i)
6184  {
6185  if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper)
6186  {
6187  highFound = true;
6188  highIndex = i;
6189  break;
6190  }
6191  }
6192 
6193  if (!lowFound && highFound)
6194  lowIndex = highIndex+1;
6195  else if (lowFound && !highFound)
6196  highIndex = lowIndex-1;
6197 }
6198 
6207 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const
6208 {
6209  return qLn(value)*mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
6210 }
6211 
6219 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const
6220 {
6221  return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
6222 }
6223 
6229 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
6230 {
6231  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
6232 }
6233 
6239 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
6240 {
6241  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
6242 }
6243 
6249 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
6250 {
6251  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
6252 }
6253 
6259 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
6260 {
6261  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
6262 }
6263 
6269 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
6270 {
6271  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
6272 }
6273 
6279 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
6280 {
6281  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
6282 }
6283 
6289 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
6290 {
6291  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
6292 }
6293 
6308 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin()
6309 {
6310  if (mCachedMarginValid)
6311  return mCachedMargin;
6312 
6313  // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
6314  int margin = 0;
6315 
6316  if (mVisible)
6317  {
6318  int lowTick, highTick;
6319  visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
6320  // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
6321  if (mTicks)
6322  margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
6323  // calculate size of tick labels:
6324  QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
6325  if (mTickLabels)
6326  {
6327  for (int i=lowTick; i<=highTick; ++i)
6328  getMaxTickLabelSize(mTickLabelFont, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize); // don't use getTickLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
6329  margin += orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
6330  margin += mTickLabelPadding;
6331  }
6332  // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
6333  if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
6334  {
6335  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mLabelFont); // don't use getLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
6336  QRect bounds;
6337  bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, mLabel);
6338  margin += bounds.height() + mLabelPadding;
6339  }
6340  }
6341  margin += mPadding;
6342 
6343  mCachedMargin = margin;
6344  mCachedMarginValid = true;
6345  return margin;
6346 }
6347 
6348 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6349 QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const
6350 {
6351  return QCP::iSelectAxes;
6352 }
6353 
6354 
6358 
6425 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6426 
6466 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
6467 /* start of documentation of signals */
6468 
6475 /* end of documentation of signals */
6476 
6488 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
6489  QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), "", keyAxis->axisRect()),
6490  mName(""),
6491  mAntialiasedFill(true),
6492  mAntialiasedScatters(true),
6493  mAntialiasedErrorBars(false),
6494  mPen(Qt::black),
6495  mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
6496  mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6497  mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
6498  mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
6499  mValueAxis(valueAxis),
6500  mSelectable(true),
6501  mSelected(false)
6502 {
6503  if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
6504  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
6505  if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
6506  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
6507 }

6684 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6685 {
6686  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
6687  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
6688 }
6689 
6695 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6696 {
6697  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6698  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
6699 
6700  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
6701  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
6702  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
6703 
6704  bool validRange;
6705  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(validRange, signDomain);
6706  if (validRange)
6707  {
6708  if (onlyEnlarge)
6709  {
6710  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
6711  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
6712  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
6713  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
6714  }
6715  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
6716  }
6717 }
6718 
6724 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
6725 {
6726  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6727  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
6728 
6729  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
6730  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
6731  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
6732 
6733  bool validRange;
6734  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(validRange, signDomain);
6735 
6736  if (validRange)
6737  {
6738  if (onlyEnlarge)
6739  {
6740  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
6741  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
6742  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
6743  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
6744  }
6745  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
6746  }
6747 }
6748 
6761 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
6762 {
6763  if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
6764  return false;
6765 
6766  if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
6767  {
6768  mParentPlot->legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
6769  return true;
6770  } else
6771  return false;
6772 }
6773 
6784 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
6785 {
6786  if (!mParentPlot->legend)
6787  return false;
6788 
6789  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
6790  return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
6791  else
6792  return false;
6793 }
6794 
6795 /* inherits documentation from base class */
6796 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
6797 {
6798  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
6799  return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
6800  else
6801  return QRect();
6802 }

6809 
6820 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
6821 {
6822  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6823  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6824  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
6825 
6826  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6827  {
6828  x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
6829  y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
6830  } else
6831  {
6832  y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
6833  x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
6834  }
6835 }
6836 
6842 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
6843 {
6844  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6845  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6846  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
6847 
6848  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6849  return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
6850  else
6851  return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
6852 }
6853 
6864 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
6865 {
6866  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
6867  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
6868  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
6869 
6870  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
6871  {
6872  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
6873  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
6874  } else
6875  {
6876  key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
6877  value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
6878  }
6879 }
6880 
6886 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
6887 {
6888  pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
6889 }

6976 
6987 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
6988 {
6989  QVector2D a(start);
6990  QVector2D b(end);
6991  QVector2D p(point);
6992  QVector2D v(b-a);
6993 
6994  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
6995  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
6996  {
6997  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
6998  if (mu < 0)
6999  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7000  else if (mu > 1)
7001  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7002  else
7003  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7004  } else
7005  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7006 }
7007 
7008 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7009 void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
7010 {
7011  Q_UNUSED(event)
7012  Q_UNUSED(details)
7013  if (mSelectable)
7014  {
7015  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7016  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
7017  if (selectionStateChanged)
7018  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7019  }
7020 }
7021 
7022 /* inherits documentation from base class */
7023 void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
7024 {
7025  if (mSelectable)
7026  {
7027  bool selBefore = mSelected;
7028  setSelected(false);
7029  if (selectionStateChanged)
7030  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
7031  }
7032 }
7033 
7034 
7038 
7065 QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name, int anchorId) :
7066  mName(name),
7067  mParentPlot(parentPlot),
7068  mParentItem(parentItem),
7069  mAnchorId(anchorId)
7070 {
7071 }
7072 
7073 QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor()
7074 {
7075  // unregister as parent at children:
7076  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7077  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7078  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7079 }
7080 
7087 QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint() const
7088 {
7089  if (mParentItem)
7090  {
7091  if (mAnchorId > -1)
7092  {
7093  return mParentItem->anchorPixelPoint(mAnchorId);
7094  } else
7095  {
7096  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
7097  return QPointF();
7098  }
7099  } else
7100  {
7101  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
7102  return QPointF();
7103  }
7104 }
7105 
7113 void QCPItemAnchor::addChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7114 {
7115  if (!mChildren.contains(pos))
7116  mChildren.insert(pos);
7117  else
7118  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7119 }
7120 
7127 void QCPItemAnchor::removeChild(QCPItemPosition *pos)
7128 {
7129  if (!mChildren.remove(pos))
7130  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
7131 }
7132 
7133 
7137 
7169 QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString name) :
7170  QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
7171  mPositionType(ptAbsolute),
7172  mKey(0),
7173  mValue(0),
7174  mParentAnchor(0)
7175 {
7176 }
7177 
7178 QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
7179 {
7180  // unregister as parent at children:
7181  // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
7182  // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPoint
7183  QList<QCPItemPosition*> currentChildren(mChildren.toList());
7184  for (int i=0; i<currentChildren.size(); ++i)
7185  currentChildren.at(i)->setParentAnchor(0); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildren
7186  // unregister as child in parent:
7187  if (mParentAnchor)
7188  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7189 }
7190 
7213 void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
7214 {
7215  if (mPositionType != type)
7216  {
7217  // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
7218  // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPoint() because it would output a qDebug warning.
7219  bool recoverPixelPosition = true;
7220  if ((mPositionType == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
7221  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7222  if ((mPositionType == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
7223  recoverPixelPosition = false;
7224 
7225  QPointF pixelP;
7226  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7227  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7228 
7229  mPositionType = type;
7230 
7231  if (recoverPixelPosition)
7232  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7233  }
7234 }
7235 
7251 bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
7252 {
7253  // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
7254  if (parentAnchor == this)
7255  {
7256  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7257  return false;
7258  }
7259  // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
7260  QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
7261  while (currentParent)
7262  {
7263  if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
7264  {
7265  // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
7266  if (currentParentPos == this)
7267  {
7268  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7269  return false;
7270  }
7271  currentParent = currentParentPos->mParentAnchor;
7272  } else
7273  {
7274  // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
7275  // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
7276  // because they're both on the same item:
7277  if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
7278  {
7279  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
7280  return false;
7281  }
7282  break;
7283  }
7284  }
7285 
7286  // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
7287  if (!mParentAnchor && mPositionType == ptPlotCoords)
7288  setType(ptAbsolute);
7289 
7290  // save pixel position:
7291  QPointF pixelP;
7292  if (keepPixelPosition)
7293  pixelP = pixelPoint();
7294  // unregister at current parent anchor:
7295  if (mParentAnchor)
7296  mParentAnchor->removeChild(this);
7297  // register at new parent anchor:
7298  if (parentAnchor)
7299  parentAnchor->addChild(this);
7300  mParentAnchor = parentAnchor;
7301  // restore pixel position under new parent:
7302  if (keepPixelPosition)
7303  setPixelPoint(pixelP);
7304  else
7305  setCoords(0, 0);
7306  return true;
7307 }
7308 
7322 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
7323 {
7324  mKey = key;
7325  mValue = value;
7326 }
7327 
7333 void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
7334 {
7335  setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
7336 }
7337 
7344 QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPoint() const
7345 {
7346  switch (mPositionType)
7347  {
7348  case ptAbsolute:
7349  {
7350  if (mParentAnchor)
7351  return QPointF(mKey, mValue) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7352  else
7353  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7354  }
7355 
7356  case ptViewportRatio:
7357  {
7358  if (mParentAnchor)
7359  {
7360  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7361  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7362  } else
7363  {
7364  return QPointF(mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width(),
7365  mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height()) + mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft();
7366  }
7367  }
7368 
7369  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7370  {
7371  if (mAxisRect)
7372  {
7373  if (mParentAnchor)
7374  {
7375  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7376  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mParentAnchor->pixelPoint();
7377  } else
7378  {
7379  return QPointF(mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width(),
7380  mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height()) + mAxisRect.data()->topLeft();
7381  }
7382  } else
7383  {
7384  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7385  return QPointF(mKey, mValue);
7386  }
7387  }
7388 
7389  case ptPlotCoords:
7390  {
7391  double x, y;
7392  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7393  {
7394  // both key and value axis are given, translate key/value to x/y coordinates:
7395  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7396  {
7397  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7398  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7399  } else
7400  {
7401  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7402  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7403  }
7404  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7405  {
7406  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7407  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7408  {
7409  x = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7410  y = mValue;
7411  } else
7412  {
7413  y = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
7414  x = mValue;
7415  }
7416  } else if (mValueAxis)
7417  {
7418  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
7419  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7420  {
7421  x = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7422  y = mKey;
7423  } else
7424  {
7425  y = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
7426  x = mKey;
7427  }
7428  } else
7429  {
7430  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
7431  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
7432  x = mKey;
7433  y = mValue;
7434  }
7435  return QPointF(x, y);
7436  }
7437  }
7438  return QPointF();
7439 }
7440 
7446 void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
7447 {
7448  mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
7449  mValueAxis = valueAxis;
7450 }
7451 
7457 void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
7458 {
7459  mAxisRect = axisRect;
7460 }
7461 
7472 void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPoint(const QPointF &pixelPoint)
7473 {
7474  switch (mPositionType)
7475  {
7476  case ptAbsolute:
7477  {
7478  if (mParentAnchor)
7479  setCoords(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7480  else
7481  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7482  break;
7483  }
7484 
7485  case ptViewportRatio:
7486  {
7487  if (mParentAnchor)
7488  {
7489  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7490  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7491  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7492  setCoords(p);
7493  } else
7494  {
7495  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentPlot->viewport().topLeft());
7496  p.rx() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().width();
7497  p.ry() /= (double)mParentPlot->viewport().height();
7498  setCoords(p);
7499  }
7500  break;
7501  }
7502 
7503  case ptAxisRectRatio:
7504  {
7505  if (mAxisRect)
7506  {
7507  if (mParentAnchor)
7508  {
7509  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mParentAnchor->pixelPoint());
7510  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7511  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7512  setCoords(p);
7513  } else
7514  {
7515  QPointF p(pixelPoint-mAxisRect.data()->topLeft());
7516  p.rx() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->width();
7517  p.ry() /= (double)mAxisRect.data()->height();
7518  setCoords(p);
7519  }
7520  } else
7521  {
7522  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axis rect defined";
7523  setCoords(pixelPoint);
7524  }
7525  break;
7526  }
7527 
7528  case ptPlotCoords:
7529  {
7530  double newKey, newValue;
7531  if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
7532  {
7533  // both key and value axis are given, translate point to key/value coordinates:
7534  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7535  {
7536  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7537  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7538  } else
7539  {
7540  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7541  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7542  }
7543  } else if (mKeyAxis)
7544  {
7545  // only key axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to key coordinate, other stays pixel:
7546  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7547  {
7548  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7549  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
7550  } else
7551  {
7552  newKey = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7553  newValue = pixelPoint.x();
7554  }
7555  } else if (mValueAxis)
7556  {
7557  // only value axis is given, depending on orientation only transform x or y to value coordinate, other stays pixel:
7558  if (mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
7559  {
7560  newKey = pixelPoint.y();
7561  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.x());
7562  } else
7563  {
7564  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
7565  newValue = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(pixelPoint.y());
7566  }
7567  } else
7568  {
7569  // no axis given, basically the same as if mPositionType were ptAbsolute
7570  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "No axes defined";
7571  newKey = pixelPoint.x();
7572  newValue = pixelPoint.y();
7573  }
7574  setCoords(newKey, newValue);
7575  break;
7576  }
7577  }
7578 }
7579 
7580 
7584 
7707 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
7708 
7724 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
7725 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
7726 
7737 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
7738 /* start documentation of signals */
7739 
7745 /* end documentation of signals */
7746 
7750 QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
7751  QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
7752  mClipToAxisRect(false),
7753  mSelectable(true),
7754  mSelected(false)
7755 {
7756  QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
7757  if (rects.size() > 0)
7758  {
7759  setClipToAxisRect(true);
7760  setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
7761  }
7762 }
7763 
7764 QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
7765 {
7766  // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
7767  qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
7768 }
7769 
7776 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
7777 {
7778  mClipToAxisRect = clip;
7779  if (mClipToAxisRect)
7780  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
7781 }
7782 
7789 void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
7790 {
7791  mClipAxisRect = rect;
7792  if (mClipToAxisRect)
7793  setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
7794 }
7795 
7805 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
7806 {
7807  mSelectable = selectable;
7808 }
7809 
7824 void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
7825 {
7826  if (mSelected != selected)
7827  {
7828  mSelected = selected;
7829  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
7830  }
7831 }
7832 
7843 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
7844 {
7845  for (int i=0; i<mPositions.size(); ++i)
7846  {
7847  if (mPositions.at(i)->name() == name)
7848  return mPositions.at(i);
7849  }
7850  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
7851  return 0;
7852 }
7853 
7864 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
7865 {
7866  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
7867  {
7868  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
7869  return mAnchors.at(i);
7870  }
7871  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
7872  return 0;
7873 }
7874 
7883 bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
7884 {
7885  for (int i=0; i<mAnchors.size(); ++i)
7886  {
7887  if (mAnchors.at(i)->name() == name)
7888  return true;
7889  }
7890  return false;
7891 }
7892 
7902 QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
7903 {
7904  if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
7905  return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
7906  else
7907  return mParentPlot->viewport();
7908 }
7909 
7923 void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
7924 {
7925  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
7926 }
7927 
7940 double QCPAbstractItem::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
7941 {
7942  QVector2D a(start);
7943  QVector2D b(end);
7944  QVector2D p(point);
7945  QVector2D v(b-a);
7946 
7947  double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
7948  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
7949  {
7950  double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
7951  if (mu < 0)
7952  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7953  else if (mu > 1)
7954  return (b-p).lengthSquared();
7955  else
7956  return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
7957  } else
7958  return (a-p).lengthSquared();
7959 }
7960 
7978 double QCPAbstractItem::rectSelectTest(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
7979 {
7980  double result = -1;
7981 
7982  // distance to border:
7983  QList<QLineF> lines;
7984  lines << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
7985  << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
7986  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
7987  for (int i=0; i<lines.size(); ++i)
7988  {
7989  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(lines.at(i).p1(), lines.at(i).p2(), pos);
7990  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
7991  minDistSqr = distSqr;
7992  }
7993  result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
7994 
7995  // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
7996  if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
7997  {
7998  if (rect.contains(pos))
7999  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
8000  }
8001  return result;
8002 }
8003 
8014 QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
8015 {
8016  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
8017  return QPointF();
8018 }
8019 
8034 QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
8035 {
8036  if (hasAnchor(name))
8037  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8038  QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
8039  mPositions.append(newPosition);
8040  mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
8041  newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
8042  newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
8043  if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
8044  newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
8045  newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
8046  return newPosition;
8047 }
8048 
8068 QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
8069 {
8070  if (hasAnchor(name))
8071  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
8072  QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
8073  mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
8074  return newAnchor;
8075 }
8076 
8077 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8078 void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
8079 {
8080  Q_UNUSED(event)
8081  Q_UNUSED(details)
8082  if (mSelectable)
8083  {
8084  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8085  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
8086  if (selectionStateChanged)
8087  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8088  }
8089 }
8090 
8091 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8092 void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
8093 {
8094  if (mSelectable)
8095  {
8096  bool selBefore = mSelected;
8097  setSelected(false);
8098  if (selectionStateChanged)
8099  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
8100  }
8101 }
8102 
8103 /* inherits documentation from base class */
8104 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
8105 {
8106  return QCP::iSelectItems;
8107 }

8109 
8301 
8314 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
8315 
8337 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
8338 /* start of documentation of signals */
8339 
8527 /* end of documentation of signals */
8528 
8532 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
8533  QWidget(parent),
8534  xAxis(0),
8535  yAxis(0),
8536  xAxis2(0),
8537  yAxis2(0),
8538  legend(0),
8539  mPlotLayout(0),
8540  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
8541  mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
8542  mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
8543  mInteractions(0),
8544  mSelectionTolerance(8),
8545  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
8546  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
8547  mBackgroundScaled(true),
8548  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
8549  mCurrentLayer(0),
8550  mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels),
8551  mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
8552  mPaintBuffer(size()),
8553  mMouseEventElement(0),
8554  mReplotting(false)
8555 {
8556  setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
8557  setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
8558  setMouseTracking(true);
8559  QLocale currentLocale = locale();
8560  currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
8561  setLocale(currentLocale);
8562 
8563  // create initial layers:
8564  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "background"));
8565  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "grid"));
8566  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "main"));
8567  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "axes"));
8568  mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, "legend"));
8569  updateLayerIndices();
8570  setCurrentLayer("main");
8571 
8572  // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
8573  mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
8574  mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
8575  mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
8576  QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
8577  mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
8578  xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
8579  yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
8580  xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
8581  yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
8582  legend = new QCPLegend;
8583  legend->setVisible(false);
8584  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
8585  defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
8586 
8587  defaultAxisRect->setLayer("background");
8588  xAxis->setLayer("axes");
8589  yAxis->setLayer("axes");
8590  xAxis2->setLayer("axes");
8591  yAxis2->setLayer("axes");
8592  xAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8593  yAxis->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8594  xAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8595  yAxis2->grid()->setLayer("grid");
8596  legend->setLayer("legend");
8597 
8598  setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
8599 
8600 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
8601  setPlottingHint(QCP::phForceRepaint);
8602 #endif
8603 
8604  replot();
8605 }
8606 
8607 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
8608 {
8609  clearPlottables();
8610  clearItems();
8611 
8612  if (mPlotLayout)
8613  {
8614  delete mPlotLayout;
8615  mPlotLayout = 0;
8616  }
8617 
8618  mCurrentLayer = 0;
8619  qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
8620  mLayers.clear();
8621 }
8622 
8640 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
8641 {
8642  mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
8643 
8644  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8645  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8646  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
8647 }
8648 
8656 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
8657 {
8658  if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
8659  mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
8660  else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
8661  mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
8662 
8663  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8664  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8665  mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
8666 }
8667 
8686 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
8687 {
8688  mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
8689 
8690  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8691  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8692  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
8693 }
8694 
8702 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
8703 {
8704  if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
8705  mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
8706  else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
8707  mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
8708 
8709  // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
8710  if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
8711  mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
8712 }
8713 
8720 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
8721 {
8722  mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
8723 }
8724 
8779 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
8780 {
8781  mInteractions = interactions;
8782 }
8783 
8791 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
8792 {
8793  if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
8794  mInteractions &= ~interaction;
8795  else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
8796  mInteractions |= interaction;
8797 }
8798 
8812 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
8813 {
8814  mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
8815 }
8816 
8826 void QCustomPlot::setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(bool enabled)
8827 {
8828  mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
8829 }
8830 
8836 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
8837 {
8838  mPlottingHints = hints;
8839 }
8840 
8846 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
8847 {
8848  QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
8849  if (!enabled)
8850  newHints &= ~hint;
8851  else
8852  newHints |= hint;
8853 
8854  if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
8855  setPlottingHints(newHints);
8856 }
8857 
8868 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
8869 {
8870  mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
8871 }
8872 
8880 void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect)
8881 {
8882  mViewport = rect;
8883  if (mPlotLayout)
8884  mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
8885 }
8886 
8902 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
8903 {
8904  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
8905  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
8906 }

8921 void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
8922 {
8923  mBackgroundBrush = brush;

8934 {
8935  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
8936  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
8937  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
8938  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
8939 }

8953  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
8954 }
