15462 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)
15463 {
15464  mPadding = padding;
15465 }
15466 
15467 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15468 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15469 {
15470  Q_UNUSED(details)
15471  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15472  return -1;
15473 
15474  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
15475  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for non-rotated rects:
15476  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
15477  QTransform inputTransform;
15478  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
15479  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
15480  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
15481  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
15482  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
15483  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15484  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15485  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
15486  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15487 
15488  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
15489 }
15490 
15491 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15492 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15493 {
15494  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
15495  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
15496  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
15497  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
15498  transform.rotate(mRotation);
15499  painter->setFont(mainFont());
15500  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15501  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15502  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
15503  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
15504  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15505  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
15506  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
15507  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
15508  {
15509  painter->setTransform(transform);
15510  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
15511  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
15512  {
15513  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15514  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15515  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
15516  }
15517  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15518  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
15519  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15520  }
15521 }
15522 
15523 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15524 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15525 {
15526  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
15527  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
15528  QTransform transform;
15529  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
15530  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
15531  transform.rotate(mRotation);
15532  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
15533  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
15534  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
15535  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
15536  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
15537  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
15538 
15539  switch (anchorId)
15540  {
15541  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
15542  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
15543  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
15544  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
15545  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
15546  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
15547  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
15548  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
15549  }
15550 
15551  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15552  return QPointF();
15553 }
15554 
15565 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
15566 {
15567  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
15568  return pos;
15569 
15570  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
15571  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
15572  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
15573  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
15574  result.rx() -= rect.width();
15575  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
15576  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
15577  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
15578  result.ry() -= rect.height();
15579  return result;
15580 }
15581 
15587 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const
15588 {
15589  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
15590 }
15591 
15597 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const
15598 {
15599  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
15600 }
15601 
15607 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
15608 {
15609  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15610 }
15611 
15617 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
15618 {
15619  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
15620 }
15621 
15622 
15626 
15640 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15641  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15642  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
15643  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
15644  topLeftRim(createAnchor("topLeftRim", aiTopLeftRim)),
15645  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15646  topRightRim(createAnchor("topRightRim", aiTopRightRim)),
15647  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15648  bottomRightRim(createAnchor("bottomRightRim", aiBottomRightRim)),
15649  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15650  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor("bottomLeftRim", aiBottomLeftRim)),
15651  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft)),
15652  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
15653 {
15654  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
15655  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
15656 
15657  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
15658  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
15659  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15660  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15661 }
15662 
15663 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
15664 {
15665 }
15666 
15672 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
15673 {
15674  mPen = pen;
15675 }
15676 
15682 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
15683 {
15684  mSelectedPen = pen;
15685 }
15686 
15693 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
15694 {
15695  mBrush = brush;
15696 }
15697 
15704 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
15705 {
15706  mSelectedBrush = brush;
15707 }
15708 
15709 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15710 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15711 {
15712  Q_UNUSED(details)
15713  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15714  return -1;
15715 
15716  double result = -1;
15717  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
15718  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
15719  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
15720  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
15721  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
15722  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
15723  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
15724 
15725  // distance to border:
15726  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
15727  result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
15728  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
15729  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
15730  {
15731  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
15732  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
15733  }
15734  return result;
15735 }
15736 
15737 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15738 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15739 {
15740  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
15741  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
15742  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
15743  return;
15744  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
15745  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
15746  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
15747  {
15748  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15749  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15750 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
15751  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
15752  {
15753 #endif
15754  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
15755 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
15756  } catch (...)
15757  {
15758  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
15759  setVisible(false);
15760  }
15761 #endif
15762  }
15763 }
15764 
15765 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15766 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15767 {
15768  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
15769  switch (anchorId)
15770  {
15771  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15772  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
15773  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15774  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15775  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15776  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15777  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
15778  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
15779  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15780  }
15781 
15782  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15783  return QPointF();
15784 }
15785 
15791 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
15792 {
15793  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
15794 }
15795 
15801 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
15802 {
15803  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
15804 }
15805 
15806 
15810 
15830 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
15831  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
15832  topLeft(createPosition("topLeft")),
15833  bottomRight(createPosition("bottomRight")),
15834  top(createAnchor("top", aiTop)),
15835  topRight(createAnchor("topRight", aiTopRight)),
15836  right(createAnchor("right", aiRight)),
15837  bottom(createAnchor("bottom", aiBottom)),
15838  bottomLeft(createAnchor("bottomLeft", aiBottomLeft)),
15839  left(createAnchor("left", aiLeft))
15840 {
15841  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
15842  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
15843 
15844  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15845  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
15846  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
15847 }
15848 
15849 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()
15850 {
15851 }
15852 
15856 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
15857 {
15858  mPixmap = pixmap;
15859  if (mPixmap.isNull())
15860  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
15861 }
15862 
15867 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode)
15868 {
15869  mScaled = scaled;
15870  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
15871  updateScaledPixmap();
15872 }
15873 
15879 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
15880 {
15881  mPen = pen;
15882 }
15883 
15889 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
15890 {
15891  mSelectedPen = pen;
15892 }
15893 
15894 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15895 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
15896 {
15897  Q_UNUSED(details)
15898  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
15899  return -1;
15900 
15901  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
15902 }
15903 
15904 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15905 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15906 {
15907  bool flipHorz = false;
15908  bool flipVert = false;
15909  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15910  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
15911  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
15912  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
15913  {
15914  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
15915  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
15916  QPen pen = mainPen();
15917  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
15918  {
15919  painter->setPen(pen);
15920  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15921  painter->drawRect(rect);
15922  }
15923  }
15924 }
15925 
15926 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15927 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
15928 {
15929  bool flipHorz;
15930  bool flipVert;
15931  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15932  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
15933  // the flipped state:
15934  if (flipHorz)
15935  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
15936  if (flipVert)
15937  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
15938 
15939  switch (anchorId)
15940  {
15941  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
15942  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
15943  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15944  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
15945  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
15946  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;;
15947  }
15948 
15949  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
15950  return QPointF();
15951 }
15952 
15966 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
15967 {
15968  if (mPixmap.isNull())
15969  return;
15970 
15971  if (mScaled)
15972  {
15973  if (finalRect.isNull())
15974  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
15975  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size())
15976  {
15977  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
15978  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
15979  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
15980  }
15981  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
15982  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
15983 }
15984 
15999 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
16000 {
16001  QRect result;
16002  bool flipHorz = false;
16003  bool flipVert = false;
16004  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
16005  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
16006  if (p1 == p2)
16007  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
16008  if (mScaled)
16009  {
16010  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
16011  QPoint topLeft = p1;
16012  if (newSize.width() < 0)
16013  {
16014  flipHorz = true;
16015  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
16016  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
16017  }
16018  if (newSize.height() < 0)
16019  {
16020  flipVert = true;
16021  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
16022  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
16023  }
16024  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
16025  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
16026  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
16027  } else
16028  {
16029  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
16030  }
16031  if (flippedHorz)
16032  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
16033  if (flippedVert)
16034  *flippedVert = flipVert;
16035  return result;
16036 }
16037 
16043 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
16044 {
16045  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16046 }
16047 
16048 
16052 
16088 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
16089  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
16090  position(createPosition("position")),
16091  mGraph(0)
16092 {
16093  position->setCoords(0, 0);
16094 
16095  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16096  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16097  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
16098  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
16099  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
16100  setSize(6);
16101  setInterpolating(false);
16102  setGraphKey(0);
16103 }
16104 
16105 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
16106 {
16107 }
16108 
16114 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen)
16115 {
16116  mPen = pen;
16117 }
16118 
16124 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
16125 {
16126  mSelectedPen = pen;
16127 }
16128 
16134 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
16135 {
16136  mBrush = brush;
16137 }
16138 
16144 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
16145 {
16146  mSelectedBrush = brush;
16147 }
16148 
16153 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size)
16154 {
16155  mSize = size;
16156 }
16157 
16164 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
16165 {
16166  mStyle = style;
16167 }
16168 
16179 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
16180 {
16181  if (graph)
16182  {
16183  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
16184  {
16185  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
16186  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
16187  mGraph = graph;
16188  updatePosition();
16189  } else
16190  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
16191  } else
16192  {
16193  mGraph = 0;
16194  }
16195 }
16196 
16206 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
16207 {
16208  mGraphKey = key;
16209 }
16210 
16222 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
16223 {
16224  mInterpolating = enabled;
16225 }
16226 
16227 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16228 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
16229 {
16230  Q_UNUSED(details)
16231  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
16232  return -1;
16233 
16234  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
16235  double w = mSize/2.0;
16236  QRect clip = clipRect();
16237  switch (mStyle)
16238  {
16239  case tsNone: return -1;
16240  case tsPlus:
16241  {
16242  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16243  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0), pos),
16244  distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w), pos)));
16245  break;
16246  }
16247  case tsCrosshair:
16248  {
16249  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()), QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
16250  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()), QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
16251  }
16252  case tsCircle:
16253  {
16254  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16255  {
16256  // distance to border:
16257  double centerDist = QVector2D(center-pos).length();
16258  double circleLine = w;
16259  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
16260  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
16261  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
16262  {
16263  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
16264  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
16265  }
16266  return result;
16267  }
16268  break;
16269  }
16270  case tsSquare:
16271  {
16272  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16273  {
16274  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
16275  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
16276  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
16277  }
16278  break;
16279  }
16280  }
16281  return -1;
16282 }
16283 
16284 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16285 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
16286 {
16287  updatePosition();
16288  if (mStyle == tsNone)
16289  return;
16290 
16291  painter->setPen(mainPen());
16292  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
16293  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
16294  double w = mSize/2.0;
16295  QRect clip = clipRect();
16296  switch (mStyle)
16297  {
16298  case tsNone: return;
16299  case tsPlus:
16300  {
16301  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16302  {
16303  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
16304  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
16305  }
16306  break;
16307  }
16308  case tsCrosshair:
16309  {
16310  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
16311  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
16312  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
16313  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
16314  break;
16315  }
16316  case tsCircle:
16317  {
16318  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16319  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
16320  break;
16321  }
16322  case tsSquare:
16323  {
16324  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
16325  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
16326  break;
16327  }
16328  }
16329 }
16330 
16343 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
16344 {
16345  if (mGraph)
16346  {
16347  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
16348  {
16349  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
16350  {
16351  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
16352  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
16353  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
16354  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
16355  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
16356  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
16357  else
16358  {
16359  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = first;
16360  it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
16361  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
16362  {
16363  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it-1;
16364  if (mInterpolating)
16365  {
16366  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
16367  double slope = (it.value().value-prevIt.value().value)/(it.key()-prevIt.key());
16368  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt.key())*slope+prevIt.value().value);
16369  } else
16370  {
16371  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
16372  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key()+it.key())*0.5)
16373  it = prevIt;
16374  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16375  }
16376  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
16377  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16378  }
16379  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
16380  {
16381  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
16382  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
16383  } else
16384  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
16385  } else
16386  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
16387  }
16388 }
16389 
16395 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
16396 {
16397  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16398 }
16399 
16405 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
16406 {
16407  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
16408 }
16409 
16410 
16414 
16440 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
16441  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
16442  left(createPosition("left")),
16443  right(createPosition("right")),
16444  center(createAnchor("center", aiCenter))
16445 {
16446  left->setCoords(0, 0);
16447  right->setCoords(1, 1);
16448 
16449  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
16450  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
16451  setLength(8);
16452  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
16453 }
16454 
16455 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
16456 {
16457 }
16458 
16468 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
16469 {
16470  mPen = pen;
16471 }
16472 
16478 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
16479 {
16480  mSelectedPen = pen;
16481 }
16482 
16491 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
16492 {
16493  mLength = length;
16494 }
16495 
16501 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
16502 {
16503  mStyle = style;
16504 }
16505 
16506 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16507 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
16508 {
16509  Q_UNUSED(details)
16510  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
16511  return -1;
16512 
16513  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16514  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16515  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16516  return -1;
16517 
16518  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16519  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16520  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16521  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16522 
16523  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), pos));
16524 }
16525 
16526 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16527 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
16528 {
16529  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16530  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16531  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16532  return;
16533 
16534  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16535  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16536  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16537  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16538 
16539  QPolygon boundingPoly;
16540  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
16541  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
16542  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
16543  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
16544  {
16545  painter->setPen(mainPen());
16546  switch (mStyle)
16547  {
16548  case bsSquare:
16549  {
16550  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
16551  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16552  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16553  break;
16554  }
16555  case bsRound:
16556  {
16557  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16558  QPainterPath path;
16559  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16560  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16561  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16562  painter->drawPath(path);
16563  break;
16564  }
16565  case bsCurly:
16566  {
16567  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
16568  QPainterPath path;
16569  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16570  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+1*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16571  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+1*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16572  painter->drawPath(path);
16573  break;
16574  }
16575  case bsCalligraphic:
16576  {
16577  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
16578  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
16579  QPainterPath path;
16580  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16581 
16582  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
16583  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4*widthVec+0.8*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.8).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16584 
16585  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2).toPointF());
16586  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2*widthVec+1.2*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec*1-lengthVec*0.5).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
16587 
16588  painter->drawPath(path);
16589  break;
16590  }
16591  }
16592  }
16593 }
16594 
16595 /* inherits documentation from base class */
16596 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
16597 {
16598  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
16599  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
16600  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
16601  return leftVec.toPointF();
16602 
16603  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5;
16604  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
16605  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
16606  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5-lengthVec;
16607 
16608  switch (anchorId)
16609  {
16610  case aiCenter:
16611  return centerVec.toPointF();
16612  }
16613  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
16614  return QPointF();
16615 }
16616 
16622 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const
16623 {
16624  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
16625 }
16626 
16627 
16631 
16669 /* start documentation of inline functions */
16670 
16751 /* end documentation of inline functions */
16752 
16757 QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
16758  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
16759  mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
16760  mBackgroundScaled(true),
16761  mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
16762  mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
16763  mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
16764  mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
16765  mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
16766  mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
16767  mDragging(false)
16768 {
16769  mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
16770  mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
16771  mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
16772 
16773  setMinimumSize(50, 50);
16774  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
16775  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16776  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16777  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16778  mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
16779 
16780  if (setupDefaultAxes)
16781  {
16782  QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16783  QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16784  QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16785  QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16786  setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
16787  setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
16788  xAxis2->setVisible(false);
16789  yAxis2->setVisible(false);
16790  xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
16791  yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
16792  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16793  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16794  xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
16795  yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
16796  xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16797  yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
16798  }
16799 }
16800 
16801 QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
16802 {
16803  delete mInsetLayout;
16804  mInsetLayout = 0;
16805 
16806  QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = axes();
16807  for (int i=0; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
16808  removeAxis(axesList.at(i));
16809 }
16810 
16816 int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
16817 {
16818  return mAxes.value(type).size();
16819 }
16820 
16826 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
16827 {
16828  QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
16829  if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
16830  {
16831  return ax.at(index);
16832  } else
16833  {
16834  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
16835  return 0;
16836  }
16837 }
16838 
16847 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
16848 {
16849  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16850  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
16851  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16852  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
16853  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
16854  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
16855  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
16856  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
16857  result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16858  return result;
16859 }
16860 
16865 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
16866 {
16867  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16868  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
16869  while (it.hasNext())
16870  {
16871  it.next();
16872  result << it.value();
16873  }
16874  return result;
16875 }
16876 
16886 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
16887 {
16888  QCPAxis *newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
16889  if (mAxes[type].size() > 0) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
16890  {
16891  bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
16892  newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
16893  newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
16894  }
16895  mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
16896  return newAxis;
16897 }
16898 
16907 QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
16908 {
16909  QList<QCPAxis*> result;
16910  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
16911  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16912  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
16913  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16914  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
16915  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16916  if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
16917  result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16918  return result;
16919 }
16920 
16928 bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
16929 {
16930  // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
16931  QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
16932  while (it.hasNext())
16933  {
16934  it.next();
16935  if (it.value().contains(axis))
16936  {
16937  mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
16938  if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
16939  parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
16940  delete axis;
16941  return true;
16942  }
16943  }
16944  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
16945  return false;
16946 }
16947 
16969 void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
16970 {
16971  QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
16972  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
16973  xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16974  else
16975  xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
16976 
16977  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
16978  yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16979  else
16980  yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
16981 
16982  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
16983  xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16984  else
16985  xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
16986 
16987  if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
16988  yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16989  else
16990  yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
16991 
16992  xAxis2->setVisible(true);
16993  xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
16994  if (xAxis)
16995  {
16996  xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
16997  xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
16998  xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
16999  xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
17000  xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
17001  xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
17002  xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
17003  xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
17004  xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
17005  xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
17006  }
17007 
17008  yAxis2->setVisible(true);
17009  yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17010  if (yAxis)
17011  {
17012  yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
17013  yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
17014  yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
17015  yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
17016  yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
17017  yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
17018  yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
17019  yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
17020  yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
17021  yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
17022  }
17023 
17024  if (connectRanges)
17025  {
17026  connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17027  connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17028  }
17029 }
17030 
17039 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
17040 {
17041  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17042  QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
17043  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mPlottables.size(); ++i)
17044  {
17045  if (mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17046  result.append(mParentPlot->mPlottables.at(i));
17047  }
17048  return result;
17049 }
17050 
17059 QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
17060 {
17061  // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17062  QList<QCPGraph*> result;
17063  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->mGraphs.size(); ++i)
17064  {
17065  if (mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17066  result.append(mParentPlot->mGraphs.at(i));
17067  }
17068  return result;
17069 }
17070 
17081 QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
17082 {
17083  // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17084  // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
17085  QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
17086  for (int itemId=0; itemId<mParentPlot->mItems.size(); ++itemId)
17087  {
17088  if (mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->clipAxisRect() == this)
17089  {
17090  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
17091  continue;
17092  }
17093  QList<QCPItemPosition*> positions = mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId)->positions();
17094  for (int posId=0; posId<positions.size(); ++itemId)
17095  {
17096  if (positions.at(posId)->axisRect() == this ||
17097  positions.at(posId)->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
17098  positions.at(posId)->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17099  {
17100  result.append(mParentPlot->mItems.at(itemId));
17101  break;
17102  }
17103  }
17104  }
17105  return result;
17106 }
17107 
17116 void QCPAxisRect::update()
17117 {
17118  QCPLayoutElement::update();
17119 
17120  // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
17121  mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
17122  mInsetLayout->update();
17123 }
17124 
17125 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17126 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
17127 {
17128  QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
17129  if (mInsetLayout)
17130  {
17131  result << mInsetLayout;
17132  if (recursive)
17133  result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
17134  }
17135  return result;
17136 }
17137 
17138 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17139 void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
17140 {
17141  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
17142 }
17143 
17144 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17145 void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
17146 {
17147  drawBackground(painter);
17148 }
17149

17167  mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
17168  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
17169 }

17186  mBackgroundBrush = brush;
17187 }

17199  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
17200  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
17201  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
17202 }

17216  mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
17217 }

17225 {
17226  mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
17227 }
17228 
17234 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17235 {
17236  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis.data() : mRangeDragVertAxis.data());
17237 }
17238 
17244 QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17245 {
17246  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data() : mRangeZoomVertAxis.data());
17247 }
17248 
17254 double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
17255 {
17256  return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
17257 }

17276 {
17277  mRangeDrag = orientations;
17278 }

17295 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoom(Qt::Orientations orientations)
17296 {
17297  mRangeZoom = orientations;
17298 }
17299 
17306 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
17307 {
17308  mRangeDragHorzAxis = horizontal;
17309  mRangeDragVertAxis = vertical;
17310 }
17311 
17319 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
17320 {
17321  mRangeZoomHorzAxis = horizontal;
17322  mRangeZoomVertAxis = vertical;
17323 }
17324 
17335 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
17336 {
17337  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
17338  mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
17339 }
17340 
17345 void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
17346 {
17347  mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
17348  mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
17349 }
17350 
17369 void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
17370 {
17371  // draw background fill:
17372  if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
17373  painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
17374 
17375  // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
17376  if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
17377  {
17378  if (mBackgroundScaled)
17379  {
17380  // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
17381  QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
17382  scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
17383  if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
17384  mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
17385  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
17386  } else
17387  {
17388  painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
17389  }
17390  }
17391 }
17392 
17403 void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
17404 {
17405  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
17406  for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
17407  axesList.at(i)->setOffset(axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin() + axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn());
17408 }
17409 
17410 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17411 int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
17412 {
17413  if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
17414  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
17415 
17416  updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
17417 
17418  // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
17419  const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
17420  if (axesList.size() > 0)
17421  return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
17422  else
17423  return 0;
17424 }
17425 
17437 void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17438 {
17439  mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed, to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a full click (no position change between press and release)
17440  if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
17441  {
17442  mDragging = true;
17443  // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
17444  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17445  {
17446  mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
17447  mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
17448  }
17449  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
17450  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
17451  {
17452  if (mRangeDragHorzAxis)
17453  mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data()->range();
17454  if (mRangeDragVertAxis)
17455  mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis.data()->range();
17456  }
17457  }
17458 }
17459 
17467 void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17468 {
17469  // Mouse range dragging interaction:
17470  if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
17471  {
17472  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
17473  {
17474  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragHorzAxis = mRangeDragHorzAxis.data())
17475  {
17476  if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
17477  {
17478  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) - rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
17479  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper+diff);
17480  } else if (rangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
17481  {
17482  double diff = rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) / rangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
17483  rangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper*diff);
17484  }
17485  }
17486  }
17487  if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
17488  {
17489  if (QCPAxis *rangeDragVertAxis = mRangeDragVertAxis.data())
17490  {
17491  if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
17492  {
17493  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) - rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
17494  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper+diff);
17495  } else if (rangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
17496  {
17497  double diff = rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) / rangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
17498  rangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper*diff);
17499  }
17500  }
17501  }
17502  if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
17503  {
17504  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17505  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
17506  mParentPlot->replot();
17507  }
17508  }
17509 }
17510 
17511 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17512 void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
17513 {
17514  Q_UNUSED(event)
17515  mDragging = false;
17516  if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
17517  {
17518  mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
17519  mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
17520  }
17521 }
17522 
17537 void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
17538 {
17539  // Mouse range zooming interaction:
17540  if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
17541  {
17542  if (mRangeZoom != 0)
17543  {
17544  double factor;
17545  double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
17546  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
17547  {
17548  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
17549  if (mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data())
17550  mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomHorzAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
17551  }
17552  if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
17553  {
17554  factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
17555  if (mRangeZoomVertAxis.data())
17556  mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomVertAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
17557  }
17558  mParentPlot->replot();
17559  }
17560  }
17561 }
17562 
17563 
17567 
17592 /* start of documentation of signals */
17593 
17600 /* end of documentation of signals */
17601 
17606 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
17607  QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
17608  mParentLegend(parent),
17609  mFont(parent->font()),
17610  mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
17611  mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
17612  mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
17613  mSelectable(true),
17614  mSelected(false)
17615 {
17616  setLayer("legend");
17617  setMargins(QMargins(8, 2, 8, 2));
17618 }
17619 
17625 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setFont(const QFont &font)
17626 {
17627  mFont = font;
17628 }
17629 
17635 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
17636 {
17637  mTextColor = color;
17638 }
17639 
17646 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
17647 {
17648  mSelectedFont = font;
17649 }
17650 
17657 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
17658 {
17659  mSelectedTextColor = color;
17660 }
17661 
17667 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
17668 {
17669  mSelectable = selectable;
17670 }
17671 
17680 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
17681 {
17682  if (mSelected != selected)
17683  {
17684  mSelected = selected;
17685  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
17686  }
17687 }
17688 
17689 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17690 double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
17691 {
17692  Q_UNUSED(details)
17693  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
17694  if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
17695  return -1;
17696 
17697  if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
17698  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
17699  else
17700  return -1;
17701 }
17702 
17703 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17704 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
17705 {
17706  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
17707 }
17708 
17709 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17710 QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const
17711 {
17712  return mOuterRect;
17713 }
17714 
17715 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17716 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
17717 {
17718  Q_UNUSED(event)
17719  Q_UNUSED(details)
17720  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
17721  {
17722  bool selBefore = mSelected;
17723  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
17724  if (selectionStateChanged)
17725  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
17726  }
17727 }
17728 
17729 /* inherits documentation from base class */
17730 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
17731 {
17732  if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
17733  {
17734  bool selBefore = mSelected;
17735  setSelected(false);
17736  if (selectionStateChanged)
17737  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
17738  }
17739 }
17740 
17744 
17778 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
17779  QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
17780  mPlottable(plottable)
17781 {
17782 }
17783 
17789 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
17790 {
17791  return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
17792 }
17793 
17799 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
17800 {
17801  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
17802 }
17803 
17809 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
17810 {
17811  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
17812 }
17813 
17820 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
17821 {
17822  if (!mPlottable) return;
17823  painter->setFont(getFont());
17824  painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
17825  QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
17826  QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17827  QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
17828  int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
17829  painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17830  // draw icon:
17831  painter->save();
17832  painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
17833  mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
17834  painter->restore();
17835  // draw icon border:
17836  if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
17837  {
17838  painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
17839  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
17840  painter->drawRect(iconRect);
17841  }
17842 }
17843 
17849 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumSizeHint() const
17850 {
17851  if (!mPlottable) return QSize();
17852  QSize result(0, 0);
17853  QRect textRect;
17854  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
17855  QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
17856  textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
17857  result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width() + mMargins.left() + mMargins.right());
17858  result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()) + mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom());
17859  return result;
17860 }
17861 
17862 
17866 
17891 /* start of documentation of signals */
17892 
17900 /* end of documentation of signals */
17901 
17908 QCPLegend::QCPLegend()
17909 {
17910  setRowSpacing(0);
17911  setColumnSpacing(10);
17912  setMargins(QMargins(2, 3, 2, 2));
17913  setAntialiased(false);
17914  setIconSize(32, 18);
17915 
17916  setIconTextPadding(7);
17917 
17918  setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
17919  setSelectedParts(spNone);
17920 
17921  setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black));
17922  setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
17923  setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
17924  setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
17925  setBrush(Qt::white);
17926  setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
17927  setTextColor(Qt::black);
17928  setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
17929 }
17930 
17931 QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
17932 {
17933  clearItems();
17934  if (mParentPlot)
17935  mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
17936 }
17937 
17938 /* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
17939 QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
17940 {
17941  // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
17942  bool hasSelectedItems = false;
17943  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
17944  {
17945  if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
17946  {
17947  hasSelectedItems = true;
17948  break;
17949  }
17950  }
17951  if (hasSelectedItems)
17952  return mSelectedParts | spItems;
17953  else
17954  return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
17955 }
17956 
17960 void QCPLegend::setBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
17961 {
17962  mBorderPen = pen;
17963 }
17964 
17968 void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
17969 {
17970  mBrush = brush;
17971 }
17972 
17982 void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font)
17983 {
17984  mFont = font;
17985  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
17986  {
17987  if (item(i))
17988  item(i)->setFont(mFont);
17989  }
17990 }
17991 
18001 void QCPLegend::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
18002 {
18003  mTextColor = color;
18004  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18005  {
18006  if (item(i))
18007  item(i)->setTextColor(color);
18008  }
18009 }

18017  mIconSize = size;

18025  mIconSize.setHeight(height);
18026 }
18027 
18033 void QCPLegend::setIconTextPadding(int padding)
18034 {
18035  mIconTextPadding = padding;
18036 }
18037 
18044 void QCPLegend::setIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
18045 {
18046  mIconBorderPen = pen;
18047 }
18048 
18059 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
18060 {
18061  mSelectableParts = selectable;
18062 }
18063 
18085 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
18086 {
18087  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
18088  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
18089 
18090  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
18091  {
18092  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
18093  {
18094  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
18095  newSelected &= ~spItems;
18096  }
18097  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
18098  {
18099  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18100  {
18101  if (item(i))
18102  item(i)->setSelected(false);
18103  }
18104  }
18105  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
18106  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
18107  }
18108 }
18109 
18116 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
18117 {
18118  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
18119 }
18120 
18126 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
18127 {
18128  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
18129 }
18130 
18137 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
18138 {
18139  mSelectedBrush = brush;
18140 }
18141 
18149 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
18150 {
18151  mSelectedFont = font;
18152  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18153  {
18154  if (item(i))
18155  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
18156  }
18157 }
18158 
18166 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
18167 {
18168  mSelectedTextColor = color;
18169  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18170  {
18171  if (item(i))
18172  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
18173  }
18174 }
18175 
18181 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
18182 {
18183  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
18184 }
18185 
18192 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
18193 {
18194  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18195  {
18196  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
18197  {
18198  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
18199  return pli;
18200  }
18201  }
18202  return 0;
18203 }
18204 
18209 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
18210 {
18211  return elementCount();
18212 }
18213 
18217 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
18218 {
18219  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18220  {
18221  if (item == this->item(i))
18222  return true;
18223  }
18224  return false;
18225 }
18226 
18233 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
18234 {
18235  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
18236 }
18237 
18245 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
18246 {
18247  if (!hasItem(item))
18248  {
18249  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
18250  } else
18251  return false;
18252 }
18253 
18261 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
18262 {
18263  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
18264  {
18265  bool success = remove(ali);
18266  simplify();
18267  return success;
18268  } else
18269  return false;
18270 }
18271 
18280 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
18281 {
18282  bool success = remove(item);
18283  simplify();
18284  return success;
18285 }
18286 
18290 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
18291 {
18292  for (int i=itemCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
18293  removeItem(i);
18294 }
18295 
18302 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
18303 {
18304  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
18305  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
18306  {
18307  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
18308  {
18309  if (ali->selected())
18310  result.append(ali);
18311  }
18312  }
18313  return result;
18314 }
18315 
18329 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
18330 {
18331  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
18332 }
18333 
18339 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
18340 {
18341  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
18342 }
18343 
18349 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
18350 {
18351  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
18352 }
18353 
18359 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18360 {
18361  // draw background rect:
18362  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
18363  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
18364  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
18365 }
18366 
18367 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18368 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18369 {
18370  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
18371  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18372  return -1;
18373 
18374  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18375  {
18376  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
18377  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18378  }
18379  return -1;
18380 }
18381 
18382 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18383 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18384 {
18385  Q_UNUSED(event)
18386  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
18387  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18388  {
18389  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
18390  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
18391  if (selectionStateChanged)
18392  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
18393  }
18394 }
18395 
18396 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18397 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18398 {
18399  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
18400  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
18401  {
18402  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
18403  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
18404  if (selectionStateChanged)
18405  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
18406  }
18407 }
18408 
18409 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18410 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
18411 {
18412  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
18413 }
18414 
18415 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18416 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
18417 {
18418  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
18419 }
18420 
18421 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18422 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
18423 {
18424  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
18425 }
18426

18460 /* end documentation of signals */
18461 
18467 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
18468  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
18469  mFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
18470  mTextColor(Qt::black),
18471  mSelectedFont(QFont("sans serif", 13*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
18472  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
18473  mSelectable(false),
18474  mSelected(false)
18475 {
18476  if (parentPlot)
18477  {
18478  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
18479  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold);
18480  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold);
18481  }
18482  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
18483 }
18484 
18489 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
18490  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
18491  mText(text),
18492  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
18493  mTextColor(Qt::black),
18494  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
18495  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
18496  mSelectable(false),
18497  mSelected(false)
18498 {
18499  setLayer("axes");
18500  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
18501 }
18502

18573  if (mSelected != selected)
18574  {
18575  mSelected = selected;
18576  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
18577  }

18584 }

18586 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18587 void QCPPlotTitle::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18588 {
18589  painter->setFont(mainFont());
18590  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));
18591  painter->drawText(mRect, Qt::AlignCenter, mText, &mTextBoundingRect);
18592 }
18593 
18594 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18595 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const
18596 {
18597  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
18598  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
18599  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
18600  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
18601  return result;
18602 }
18603 
18604 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18605 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const
18606 {
18607  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
18608  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
18609  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
18610  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
18611  return result;
18612 }
18613 
18614 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18615 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18616 {
18617  Q_UNUSED(event)
18618  Q_UNUSED(details)
18619  if (mSelectable)
18620  {
18621  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18622  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
18623  if (selectionStateChanged)
18624  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18625  }
18626 }
18627 
18628 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18629 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18630 {
18631  if (mSelectable)
18632  {
18633  bool selBefore = mSelected;
18634  setSelected(false);
18635  if (selectionStateChanged)
18636  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18637  }
18638 }
18639 
18640 /* inherits documentation from base class */
18641 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18642 {
18643  Q_UNUSED(details)
18644  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
18645  return -1;
18646 
18647  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18648  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18649  else
18650  return -1;
18651 }
18652 
18658 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const
18659 {
18660  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
18661 }
18662 
18668 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const
18669 {
18670  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
18671 }
18672
